author: Don Roff
tags: admire, audience, character, character-flaw, connect, empathy, inspirational, strength, weakness, writing, writing-advice, writing-quotes

quote: With the strength of God, we shall triumph in any situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The rule of God’s kingdom strengthens fulfilment of mandate
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To Be Trained Is To Be Strengthened
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The deeper the illustration the strengthened the value
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If we wish for a new strength, we must meditate on the Scriptures.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I thank God for supply me with my deepest needs
author: a life of love with graceful strength.

quote: Many learn from the pastbut few do something with it. Take Action. Struggles bring strength to strive and succeed.
author: Farshad Asl

quote: once your get your hopes up, your mind starts acting on its own. And when your hopes are dashed you get dissapointed, and dissapointment leads to a feeling of helplessness. You get careless and let your guard down. And right now, she though, that si the last thing I can afford.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: If you wish to find the strength of being, read the Holy Bible.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If we rest, we shall renewal our strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If we rest, we shall renewal our strength
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Nothing and nobody is obliged to save you but you.
author: Toni Morrison, Home

quote: Lucy buried her head in his mane to hide from his face. But there must have been magic in his mane. She could feel lion-strength going into her. Quite suddenly she sat up. "I'm sorry, Aslan," she said. "I'm ready now.""Now you are a lioness," said Aslan. "And now all Narnia will be renewed. But come. We have no time to lose.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: We are little flames poorly sheltered by frail walls against the storm of dissolution and madness, in which we flicker and sometimes almost go out.
author: Erich Maria Remarque, All Quiet on the Western Front

quote: The tear-stained letters of my regret will remain forever unread, for I am never going to be strong enough to give them to you.
author: Courtney M. Privett, Mayfly Requiem

quote: This land needed a sword forged in the hottest of fires to regain what was lost...and you are that sword.
author: S. Alexander O'Keefe, The Return of Sir Percival: Guinevere's Prayer

quote: Generosity is a strength, not a weakness.
author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

quote: The measure of a person is not how much they have lived. It is not how easily they jump at a noise or how quick they are to show emotion. It's how they make use of what life has shown them.
author: Brandon Sanderson, The Alloy of Law

quote: My strengths propel me and my weaknesses pursue me.
author: Sudheer Reddy

quote: Many things have broken him. He holds himself together with spit and endless smiling, but all can see the cracks. You, though; you are dented, bruised, but intact.
author: N. K. Jemisin

quote: The man of courage is not the man who did not face adversity. The man of courage is the man who faced adversity and spoke to it. The man of courage tells adversity, "You're trespassing and I give you no authority to steal my joy, my faith or my hope.
author: Kiese Laymon, How to Slowly Kill Yourself and Others in America

quote: Our enemies make us strong, Miss Muffet, not our friends. Our friends will lie to us, tell us what we need to hear. Forgive us. We must keep a few good enemies on hand, always, to keep us sharp and teach us never to do anything that needs forgiveness.
author: Ann Rinaldi, An Acquaintance with Darkness

quote: My hands are small, I knowBut they're not yours, they are my ownBut they're not yours, they are my ownAnd I am never broken
author: Jewel, Hands

quote: My suffering helps me to find grace of strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: All that I can truly have: life, strength and time!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Whoever suffers knows the strength of suffering.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: What cannot be cured must be endured.
author: Laura Frantz, A Moonbow Night

quote: Tough time don't lasts-Tough People DO
author: Kazi Mahmudul Islam

quote: You embody the strength of 10,000 moons and your life will be a testament of it. Ase
author: Kierra C.T. Banks
tags: advocate, anxiety, depression, journey, life, love, qoutes, strength, wisdom

quote: This is a girl you can’t keep. You aren’t allowed to.
author: Khadija Rupa, Unexpressed Feelings
tags: girl-quotes, impossible-quotes, keep, khadija-rupa-quotes, not-allowed-quotes, she-quotes, strength, unexpressed-feelings

quote: Only small men parade their learning, talk over their audience and air their superior knowledge. Only brutal men throw their strength about, and vain rich men display their wealth in ostentatious useless luxuries.
author: John  Myer, John Myer: A Collection of his Sermons and Writing, #1
tags: brutality, character, cruelty, goodness, greed, mansplaining, patronization, strength, vanity

quote: True strength isn’t being able to knock your enemies down, it’s being able to hold yourself upright against their blows.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: To marry and have children, that is the common lot of women. Only one woman in a hundred--more, in a thousand, can make for herself a name and position as you have done.
author: Agatha Christie, Evil Under the Sun

quote: It was a crushing defeat, but it put iron in my backbone and sulphur in my blood. I knew at least what it was to fail. I knew what it was to attempt something big.
author: Henry Miller, Tropic of Capricorn

quote: Strength is seeing yourself as you are.
author: Taro Okamoto

quote: The singular difference between success and true success is those who achieved true success did not pursue success, they were driven by it. They were those who followed their strengths, they were those who spent each heartbeat to proffer solutions to humanity’s problems, they were those who lived a highly simple and effective life.
author: Sesan Kareem

quote: I want them to hear your story. And know that there is a special strength..." As I spoke I realized I needed to hear it, know it, too. "A special strength in enduring such dark trials and hardships... And still remaining warm, and kind. Still willing to trust—and reach out.
author: Sarah J. Maas, A Court of Mist and Fury

quote: Every person I ever knew or had come across always spoke about fallingin love with the rain. They dreamt of dancing in it like there is no tomorrow but I never heard someone speaking about falling in love with a wildfire. No, it is not for the weaker ones. The moment you fall in love with the wildfire, it starts burning everything that you have ever built or grown all these years around you. It changes the way you had always imagined and looked at how the love would be, making you end up homeless. It makes you a weakness intertwined with strength, a love intertwined with hatred. It makes you a puzzle that you yourself could never solve.
author: Akshay Vasu
tags: build, dance, fall, hate, love, puzzle, rain, storm, strength, tomorrow

quote: Most of us think we can hide our weaknesses from the world, and sometimes, we're right. But only if we're very very strong.
author: Brian K. Vaughan, Saga #40

quote: The way of the world isn't the strong devouring the weak, but the weak deceiving and poisoning and whispering in the ears of the strong until they become weak, too.
author: N.K. Jemisin, The Obelisk Gate
tags: blessed-are-the-meek, meek, meekness, meekness-strength, power-politics, strength, strength-of-character

quote: You are sick not weak. It is okay to be depressed.
author: Kevin Breel

quote: Man has been woman's image of capabilityNow is the time for her to bring about her own strength
author: Neil Mach, Postcard Angel: An Innocent Girl Becomes The World's First Pin-up

quote: A Data Scientists strength lies solely in their tenacity.
author: Damian Mingle

quote: That is true strength. To want what you have, and not what someone else is holding.
author: Sarah Hepola, Blackout: Remembering the Things I Drank to Forget

quote: Team spirit fuels individual strength for a mutual success.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Value those whose capabilities are insurmountable you yourself possess the same strength....there's NO value in clowns! Believe and overcome!
author: Monica Chrisandtras Hines

quote: The sea is intriguing and exciting. It always reinforces in me a sense of belonging. The waves bring with them a strange kind of peace and calm. The sea has been a silent spectator to many major incidents in my life. The many outings with friends and family; the long walks on the shore with dad, my hero and philosopher; the moments spent with my love, the memories are endless.
author: Jagdish Joghee, In Love and Free: The tale of a woman caught between two men...

quote: That was the trick - to keep punching, no matter what.
author: Scott Westerfeld, Leviathan

quote: Humility is truth, therefore in all sincerity we must be able to look up and say, "I can do all things in Him who strengthens me." By yourself you can do nothing, have nothing but sin, weakness and misery. All the gifts of nature and grace you have them from God.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Do not focus on the problem. Pray for strength to persevere.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There is strength for every situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We are never old with the strength of the spirit, although the body may fail.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Pray for strength to preserve.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Pray for strength to persevere.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A persons emotions should be the strength, should not be the weakness
author: Sharath Nazre

quote: Achieving your goals depends more on the way you manage to push through the bad days, than shine on the good ones.
author: Lorri Faye

quote: You know your strengths but you must know your weaknesses more.
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: When we have no choice of what is to come, we must find the strength to have trust in what lies ahead. SURRENDER.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: She has her own brand of strength,brought to the surface by the dim glow of the streetlight and the whisper of night air on her skin.
author: Holly Bourne

quote: These times are hard, but I won't walk away jaded, darker, different. I feel. I cry to heal. If you saw me in those moments, maybe you'd think I was a mess. But I don't call it a mess. I call it strength.Real strength isn't about building walls. Real strength is about staying open, no matter what. It's about taking life—with all the pleasures that fade and all the pain that sticks around for too long—and not shutting down, not closing down, not building up those walls.Resilience isn't hard, impenetrable, iron. Resilience is flexible, soft, warm. Stay strong. The real kind of strong. Don't let your automatic mind reflexes make you jump away from pain and towards pleasure. Make choices. See clearly. And never, ever, stop feeling.Don't go numb. The world, even with all its horror, is too beautiful to miss.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
tags: emotions, feeling, feelings, healing, mess, self-love, self-protection, strength, strong, vulnerability

quote: We all get scared and want to turn away, but it isn’t always strength that makes you stay. Strength is also making the decision to change your destiny.
author: Zoraida Córdova, Labyrinth Lost

quote: My religion is Get Over It.
author: Nora Ephron, I Remember Nothing: and Other Reflections

quote: Every chance worth taking will make you a little scared. That means you're taking a risk. And where there is risk, there is reward.
author: Elise Kova, Crystal Crowned

quote: Apathy is giving up when we need to get up.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
tags: abandon, apathy, attitude, commit, commitment, determination, determined, focused, fortitude, get-up, give-up, mediocre, mediocrity, retreat, strength, stubborn, surrender, tenacious

quote: You are like that spark of fire, that fell on a leaf and burnt the whole tree down gradually. Look at me now, all you can see is the memories and reflections of a tree that stood tall and strong once before. But I will not let you win. I will show you, how life can rise again from just ashes and dust.
author: Akshay Vasu
tags: again, ashes, burn, down, dust, fire, rise, spark, strength

quote: Grounding is most effective when you have some place to go. When you know where you are going, grounding brings strength and confidence, when you’re stagnant you get caught in the past.
author: Tony Curl, Seriously Simple Stuff to Get You Unstuck
tags: action, clarity, confidence, effective, grounded, strength

quote: Self realization of strengths and weaknesses is the first step towards salvation.
author: Mayank S. Sengar, Life and The Grey Notes

quote: You cannot become the greatest without at least a gr- and a test inside of you
author: Johnnie Dent Jr.
tags: greatness, perserverance-quotes, personal-development, strength, success-quotes, winning

quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: There is a power within and without. If you ask, it answers. It's just a matter of being calm and wise and listening. It takes years.
author: John  Altman, In the Nick of Time - The Autobiography of John Altman, EastEnders' Nick Cotton

quote: All the words that appear in the inner circle are attributes of God. To develop a relationship with Him we must know the implications of each for our lives. We need truth. His Word contains it. We need the ability to understand the truth. His Spirit will teach us. We need strength to cope with inner turmoil. His is omnipotent. We need a model to follow. Christ is God in human form. We need standards. He is righteous. We need acceptance. He is love. We need to know who is in charge. He is.
author: J. Grant Howard, Balancing Life's Demands: A New Perspective on Priorities

quote: Fire burned in her heart, and her wounded soul spread out, casting a shadow like wings across her country.
author: Kiersten White, And I Darken

quote: Lada made her face stone, her heart a mountain. A mountain that would never be pierced to let cold, clear water flow. “Nothing holds me here.
author: Kiersten White, And I Darken

quote: Those same fists had always defied everything expected of her.
author: Kiersten White, And I Darken

quote: It was me who had to carry myself over the finish line, and all I needed to remember when I felt like not trying was that that feeling wouldn't last forever.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout, The Problem with Forever

quote: Can you drown in grief? She turned away sharply, angry with her own frailty. She had no time for the luxury of self-pity.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Clash of Kings

quote: You'll be able to find the strength to love someone just that much again once you've recovered from the heartbreak
author: Carrie Hope Fletcher, All I Know Now: Wonderings and Reflections on Growing Up Gracefully

quote: We must go on, because we can't turn back.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson, Treasure Island

quote: More is less, less is more
author: J Ali
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: ...perhaps it wasn't a matter of strength so much as pliability, a willingness to let life become unpredictable and sometimes even unravel.
author: Lorna Jane Cook, Outside Wonderland

quote: The worldly comforts are not for me. I am like a traveler, who takes a rest under a tree in the shade and then goes on his way
author: Anonymous
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: People try to use your past against you not realizing you were using it to propel you.
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: The best richness is the richness of the soul
author: Anonymous
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: Please hear me, you are not alone on this planet hurtling through space, solitude is an illusion, come let me help you, rise up, walk forward, walk tall, walk straight, let nothing stop you.
author: Danny Scheinmann, Random Acts Of Heroic Love

quote: Our lives are the Journey we take to find our true selves!
author: Alyssa Gonzalez

quote: A father gives his child nothing better than a good education
author: Anonymous
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: When two persons are together, two of them must not whisper to each other, without letting the third hear; because it would hurt him
author: Anonymous
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: Just because you are soft doesn't mean you are not a force. Honey and wildfire are both the colour gold.
author: Victoria Erickson, Edge of Wonder: Notes from the Wildness of Being

quote: In the process of helping others, I helped myself. In acting out of my own brokeness I became whole again. It's the kind of strength and determination you find when you have hit rock bottom and you realize you could die right now - and want to, but realize that even death won't make the difference you were hoping for.
author: Christina Engela, Blachart
tags: acting-out, brokenness, death, determination, die, difference, helped-myself, helping-others, hoping, rock-bottom, strength, whole-again

quote: People never know what they are capable of until all other options run out.
author: Lance Conrad, The Price of Loyalty

quote: the strongest backs bear the heaviest burdens
author: Will Bly, Consolation of the Rose

quote: Some folks got a light around them that shine for other peoples. I think that maybe some of them was in tunnels, and in that tunnel, maybe the only light they had was inside of them. And then, even long after they escaped that tunnel... They still be shining for everybody else.
author: Sapphire, Push

quote: It is better to sit alone than in company with the bad
author: and it is better still to sit with the good than alone. It is better to speak to a seeker of knowledge than to remain silent
tags: but silence is better than idle words

quote: She had maintained her strength in the face of all this for so long that we had come to take it for granted, but she wasn't bulletproof. She might've been peculiar but she was also human,
author: Ransom Riggs, Hollow City

quote: The best of you are those who are best to the women
author: Anonymous
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: It is a curious thing, watching a strong man fall to pieces.
author: Jodi Picoult, My Sister's Keeper

quote: Strength is wealth.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The calf is capable of walking quite well now," Dazu said. "He never stumbles.""But I told you to carry him back here," the teacher said. "The first thing a soldier must learn is to obey orders."Every day, the calf grew a little heavier, and every day, Dazu had to struggle a little harder. He would collapse, exhausted, when he finally got to the ranch, and the calf would bound out of his arms, glad to be able to walk on his own and stretch out.When winter rolled around again, Médo handed him a wooden sword and asked him to strike as hard as he could at the practice dummy. Dazu looked with distaste at the crude weapon with no edge, but he swung obediently.The wooden dummy fell in half, cut clean through. He looked at the sword in his hand with wonder."It's not the sword," his teacher said. "Have you looked at yourself lately?" He brought Dazu to stand in front of a brightly polished shield.The young man could hardly recognize the reflection. His shoulders filled the frame of the mirror. His arms and thighs were twice as thick as he remembered, and his chest bulged over his narrow waist."A great warrior trusts not his weapons, but himself. When you possess true strength, you can deal a killing blow even if all you have is a blade of grass."Now you're finally ready to learn from me. But first, go thank the calf for making you strong.
author: Ken Liu, The Grace of Kings
tags: allegory, muscle-building, muscles, parable, soldiers, strength

quote: Though I’m tempted by the call of the sea, I resist. It can’t claim me.In a way I’m stronger than the waves and I feel good about that.
author: Darren Shan, Bec

quote: We all eventually find that life is a series of adjustments, but anything can be overcome when there is love around you. Once can be strong on their own, but there is greater strength in knowing when to rely on others.
author: Starla Huchton, Shadows on Snow

quote: I believe i am hard as a stone, but even a stone breaks if you smash it real hard.....
author: Andy Flynn
tags: belief, inspirational, life, strength, struggle, tolerance

quote: If you do not feel ashamed of anything, then you can do whatever you like
author: Anonymous
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: It is difficult for a man laden with riches to climb the steep path, that leads to bliss
author: Anonymous
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: He was handsome and strong, but somehow that wasn't enough for him. He also felt the need to be tough and inured to hardship... But how was he to come by that quality in this luminous garden, where all manner of fruit was to be had for the picking?
author: Michael Ende, The Neverending Story

quote: Who are the learned? Those who practice what they know
author: Anonymous
tags: inspirational, motivational, reality-of-life, strength, strength-and-courage, truth

quote: My dark days made me strong. Or maybe I already was strong, and they made me prove it.
author: Emery Lord, When We Collided

quote: It took strength to be quiet. It took strength to be kind. It took strength to let other people's cruelty bounce right off of you.
author: April Genevieve Tucholke, Slasher Girls & Monster Boys

quote: We are all crazy enough to hear the voices but not strong enough to listen
author: Saahil Prem
tags: crazy, deep-thoughts, life, strength, strong, struggle, voices

quote: Failure is a part of life. Success teaches you nothing, but failure teaches you resilience. It teaches you to pick yourself up and try again.
author: Sarah Morgan, Sleepless in Manhattan
tags: failure, life-philosophy, life-quotes, resilience, strength, success

quote: You can't go back and I think that's the point of all to grow and grow until you don't want to anymore.
author: Nikki Rowe
tags: authentic, becoming, grow, growth, inner-being, inner-strength, letting-go, moving-forward, moving-on, self-love, self-love-quotes, strength, wise

quote: The world was so much more forgiving of strength when it took on the appearance of weakness.
author: Robin Wasserman, Girls on Fire

quote: I knew what I stood for, even if nobody else did. I knew the piece of me on the inside, truer than all the rest, that never comes out. Doesn't everyone have one? Some kind of grand inner princess waiting to toss her hair down, forever waiting at the tower window. Some jungle animal so noble and fierce you had to crawl on your belly through dangerous grasses to get a glimpse.
author: Michelle Tea, Valencia
tags: character, independence, individualism, individuality, personhood, strength, strength-of-character

quote: ...strength is not the absence of vulnerability. Strength is knowing what your weaknesses are and working with them.
author: Terrence Real, How Can I Get Through to You? Closing the Intimacy Gap Between Men and Women

quote: Sooner  or  later  it  would  happen:  strength  would  change  into  consciousness.
author: George Orwell, 1984

quote: Vulnerability has a strength of its own.
author: William Zinsser
tags: strength, vulnerability, vulnerable, write, writer, writes, writing, written, written-word, wrote

quote: I'm not fighting for myself anymore.... It makes a difference.
author: Christopher Paolini, Inheritance

quote: His life-experiences, and reflections upon them, led Y to believe that the most difficult challenge in life was how to be kind, yet strong. ‘To be kind is not enough,’ he would say. ‘You have to be strong to give to others, and strong to withstand life’s fluctuating fortunes.
author: Arnold Zable

quote: It is not easy to let go, but when you do; not only do you realize the strength that lies within you, you also create an opportunity to see God perform the best of miracles in your life.
author: Gugu Mona
tags: create, god, let-go, life, miracles, opportunity, realize, strength

quote: You can only find strength, if you dare conquer the situation
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I am not tough, nor hardened, nor strong. I cannot fight. I do not have what it takes. I can comfort my friends with this gift, but I cannot heal the world with it, and I certainly cannot do battle with an evil sorcerer with it! You are mistaken!
author: Mina Marial Nicoli, The Magic of Avalon Eyrelin
tags: avalon-eyrelin, battle-evil, comfort, heal, not-tough, strength

quote: You do not need any more strength. You only need to realize how strong you already are.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
tags: be-strong, healing, self-awareness, strength, strong, vulnerability

quote: As for moral courage, it is very rare, he said, to find that kind found at 2 o'clock in the morning; that is to say, courage in the face of the unexpected.
author: Napoléon Bonaparte

quote: The next time the world tells you “Stop”, “Don’t”, or “You can’t do this”, the next time the world beats the living daylight out of you, hit it back with a knock just as strong and say, “No, I want to do this.
author: Joud Tabaza, No, I Want To Do This
tags: adversity, inspirational, motivational, persistence, resilience, strength, willpower

quote: Sometimes troubles make us stronger. We put things in perspective and find priorities.
author: Gail Gaymer Martin, Loving Tenderness

quote: YOU will never know your STRENGTH until you overcome the WORST
author: Sarvesh
tags: best-quotes, famous-quotes, latest-quotes, overcome, quotes-on-life, quotesbysarvesh, sarvesh, sarvesh-quotes, strength, worst, you

quote: Dancy closes her eyes, remembering all the times that have been so much worse than this, all the horror and shame and sorrow to give her strength. The burning parts of her no one and nothing can ever touch, the fire where her soul used to be.
author: Caitlín R. Kiernan

quote: When a person is loved, they are granted the strength of all seas.
author: Simon Van Booy, The Secret Lives of People in Love

quote: I lost all I had known and gained a life I was yet to know.
author: Nikki Rowe
tags: adversity, courageous, disability-quotes, encouragement, fortitude, hope, inspire, overcoming, perspective, powerful, resilient, strength

quote: Develop flexibility and you will be firm
author: cultivate yielding and you will be strong.
tags: Liezi, The Book of Master Lie

quote: ... People were never quite what you thought they were.
author: William Golding, Lord of the Flies

quote: We are taught that the hero’s journey is the journey from weakness to strength. But I am here today to tell you that those stories are wrong. The real hero’s journey is the journey from strength to weakness.
author: John Green

quote: Its hardness and solidity had been an odd kind of comfort. Do not wish for anything. Be and endure. The Old African had learned that enduring was power too, and just as he had been drawn to the boulder, so the slaves, after a while, were drawn to him.
author: Julius Lester

quote: But you're so strong. I wish I were strong. I just like eating.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: You can try to dirty my name, but I'll wear your hate like war paint.
author: Madalyn Beck, Dragon Hearts & Dandelion Fuzz

quote: If you think a weakness can be turned into a strength, I hate to tell you this, but that's another weakness.
author: Jack Handy

quote: He studied the woman before him, not as lovely as she once was, ordinary in appearance, scarred by living, abandoned by many, breathtakingly to be near and altogether unforgettable. "I have no friends," she spoke forth hauntingly. "I am alone." He couldn't believe it. But then he could for the rare creature near enough to touch was out of their league. She wasn't envied for the shallowness of appearance or the superficiality of status or possessions; she was envied for being uncommon and for possessing indomitable strength, something only a lifetime of suffering could shape.
author: Donna Lynn Hope
tags: cattiness, envious, envy, jealousy, strength, strong, suffering, uncommon

quote: Anyone who crawls up from the gutter and makes something of themselves, despite the odds and despite others who tried to keep them down, must always be very proud of their achievements. They must never forget the struggles they went through, because they are a living example to those who wander in darkness, a staunch reminder that light is within reach if they can find the strength and determination to keep going.
author: Sarah Brownlee
tags: achievement-quote, courage-quotes, determination, inspiration-quotes, inspirational, inspirational-living, perseverance-quotes, pushing-through, strength, strength-through-adversity, struggles-quotes, success-quotes

quote: Miss Benson had the power; which some people have, of carrying her wishes through to fulfillment; her will was strong, her sense was excellent, and people yielded to her – they did not know why.
author: Elizabeth Gaskell, Ruth
tags: attitude, confidence, convincing, discretion, personality, sensible, strength

quote: The strength to go on must come from within, not without, or it crushes instead of building up the heart.
author: Tara K. Harper, Wolfwalker

quote: As one widow put it to me, “Strength doesn’t mean being able to stand up to anything, but being able to crawl on your belly a long, long time before you can stand up again.
author: Mark Matousek, When You're Falling, Dive: Lessons in the Art of Living

quote: Would he ever have the strength to stop looking?
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Life has pounded me downand thrashed me around,Time and time again,But I always get right back up,Because I still love life -Just as the earth still lovesThe rain.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem
tags: adversity, earth, endurance, endure, fall-down, fall-down-and-get-back-up, get-back-up, life, love, love-life, pound, rain, strength, time, wet

quote: Her hand had a lot of strength gained through the process of gentleness.
author: Richard Brautigan, In Watermelon Sugar

quote: Taking someone for granted is same as checking the strength of a boat by making holes in it.
author: Himanshu Chhabra

quote: Strength is wearing a smile even when you are wailing inside!
author: Deeba Salim Irfan

quote: You do not become outstanding by working on your weaknesses You become outstanding by focusing on your strenghts.
author: Gordana Biernat
tags: inspirational, outstanding, strength, success, weakness, weaknesses

quote: Strength to your arm, then.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms

quote: Was that his name? I never had a chance to ask. He was too intent upon tearing out my throat for us to engage in idle chitchat.
author: John Connolly

quote: I do not know what is going to happen to us. I am frightened but I feel strong. I have the strength of a woman who has everything to loose.
author: Erin Kelly Bartelma

quote: She didn't struggle and soshe didn't grow
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: To one degree or another we all fight against preconceptions nearly every day. The wisest people I know don't compare their fight to that of others. Everything is relative through the lens of personal struggle.Heroes come in all shapes and sizes... mine are often those who are fighting their fight in public. Unashamed. Proud. An example.Heroes aren't perfect. They have faults and flaws. They stumble from time to time. They are heroes, though, because they correct themselves... and set an example, intended or not, for the world observing them... even, and especially, to those who would love nothing more than to see them fail.Stay Strong!
author: Dennis Sharpe
tags: example, hero, heroes, inspiration, inspirational, stay-strong, strength

quote: He was a pitiful thing. He had always been a pitiful thing. Why had she never seen that before? There was a hollow place inside her where her fear had been.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Game of Thrones
tags: abuse, abuse-survivors, escaping-abuse, game-of-thrones, overcoming-fear, self-reliance, self-worth, strength

quote: Fall seven times. Get up eight.
author: Nina Lane, Arouse
tags: arouse, inspiration, inspirational, liv-west, nina-lane, olivia-west, spiral-of-bliss, strength

quote: If you accept the situation, you will find strength for strategic adaptation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Only the strong soul can accept the truth.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Trust your instincts, follow your bliss, make plans, work hard, learn to let things go. Don’t be late. Remember that fortune favors the brave. Live. If you need to run, try and run towardsomething. Study for tests. Laugh at silly cartoons. Be organized. If you fall seven times,get up eight. Always carry an extra pen. Believe you can do everything. Find your key.
author: Nina Lane, Awaken
tags: awaken, inspirational, liv-west, live, nina-lane, olivia-west, spiral-of-bliss, strength, thoughts

quote: Sometimes you just have to die a little inside in order to be reborn and rise again as a stronger and wiser version of you..!!
author: Aagam Shah

quote: Difficulties & Challenges become our strength when we focus the goal.
author: Gaurav GRV Sharma

quote: If you focus on the ultimate goal, you will find strength to overcome the hurdles on the path to success
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Trust your instincts, follow your bliss, make plans, work hard, learn to let things go. Don’t be late. Remember that fortune favors the brave. Live. quote: as they mock you due to your loss,you rise back strong and agile to win
author: Samuel Gyekye Mensah

quote: Jesus Christ gives strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I don’t have all the answers I need yet, and I’m not ready to give up until I completely understand the purpose I serve and what it is I’m supposed to do.
author: K. Weikel, The One-Hundred

quote: If you want it enough, you find strength to work for its achievement.

author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I am grateful for every situation. I discovered my potential strength.

author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: As she walks through her problems, miseries and bad days, she couldn't help but notice how her gait has become more poised and elegant. Earlier - she tripped over at the sight of a problem. Now - she keeps her head high and wins over them.Her problems made a woman out of a girl!

quote: Thank God for the grace to work.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you failure, do not give up. Find new strength to climb the stairway to success.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The strength of survival in life lies in strong-minded soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Believe. Believe. Believe in thy soul!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Encouragement gives strength to every soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The secret in any situation is the strength of spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Rest leads to renewal of spirit, soul and strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You will be lonely, but you'll become strong.
author: Marie Rutkoski, The Winner's Kiss

author: Munia Khan

quote: I won't show weakness here, but, damn it, tears don't mean I'm frail and pathetic, only that I'm unhappy.
author: Marianne Curley, Fearless

quote: You possess strength for everyday life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Every situation you conquer, you find the strength, your never knew you had.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

author: Shinjirou, Taboo Tattoo, Vol. 1

quote: Every sphere of life demands enduring spirit and strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

author: Lucas Mascotto-Carbone

quote: You will find the limit of strength with every new situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Anita is small and colourless in her grey trousers, grey knitted cardigan, grey hair and grey skin. But ove notices that her face is slightly red-eyed and swollen. Quickly she wipes her eyes and blinks away the pain. As women of that generation do. As if they stood in the doorway every morning, determinedly driving sorrow out of the house with a broom.
author: Fredrik Backman, A Man Called Ove

quote: May you have fresh strength in the spring season.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: May you have a fresh strength in the spring season.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Then a begging brother in a tattered brown robe said a blessing on his sword, and a maid kissed his cheek. 'They are for me,' "Why?" He asked Pate. "What am I to them?" "A knight who remembered his vows," the smith said.
author: George R.R. Martin
tags: a-knight-of-the-seven-kingdoms, game-of-thrones-prequel, george-r-r-martin, honor, knights, live-by-example, real-men, say-what-you-mean, strength, truth, word-is-bond, word-is-everything

quote: If you endure every struggle, you will find your potential strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: With strong heart, you will survive life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: She would figure out how to get what she wanted, what she needed, even when her long lashes failed to convince, when her body was no longer young and beautiful. She'd be more than pretty, She'd be strong.
author: Kass Morgan, Day 21

quote: The tests we face in life's journey are not to reveal our weaknesses but to help us discover our inner strengths. We can only know how strong we are when we strive and thrive beyond the challenges we face.

quote: I tread paths by moonlight that others fear to speak of during day.
author: Patrick Rothfuss, The Name of the Wind

quote: Flexibility is the greatest strength.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: In suffering, we trust the Saviour to be our strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You do not give your precious body to the billy clubs of Birmingham sheriffs, nor to the insidious activity of the streets.
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates, Between the World and Me
tags: being-black, black-power, blackness, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, life, life-lessons, life-lessons-quotes, living, living-life, living-now, people-of-color, strength

quote: Every tough situation, toughen the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: With strong heart, you will survive any hardships.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A fool mistakes meekness for weakness and a quiet tongue for an idle mind.
author: R.A. Mathis

author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: In any situation, you can find strength in the Lord.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You cannot break me. My spirit is stronger.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The Lord is the strength of my heart.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: May your spirit be strengthened.

quote: I prefer not to elaborate on the various stages of our dealings over the next few days - disbelief, anger, recrimination, the raking up of old sores, bitter silence and so on - but I can say that they gave lasting strength to our relationship, like a thick scar is stronger than the skin around it.

quote: Ahab still stood like an anvil, receiving every shock, but without the least quivering of his own.

quote: If you want to be strong, smile! He who can smile, even when he's so sad that he wants to die, when it's so painful that he wants to give it all up and run away, is the one who becomes strong.

quote: You’ve gotta believe that the split second that changed your life—the brief moment that took your leg and bruised your melon—can’t be the defining moment of your life. It was just an instant, a flash. Just one second out of millions of seconds. It doesn’t get to own you.

quote: Our ministries are strengthened, sometimes more than we realize, by our devotional life.

quote: We must learn to let the Word of God feed us and strengthen us in our faith in God its author, Christ its message, and the Holy Spirit its teacher.

quote: Are your beliefs anchored in a faith that can withstand emotionalism, the drug culture, social and peer pressure, and material temptations? The world is seething with demonic energy. Only supreme inner strength can resist its ceaseless hassling.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: We shouldn’t think about ourselves and how weak we are. Instead, we should think about God and how strong He is.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Great souls know the strength of their spirit.

quote: We are powerful beyond imagination.

quote: God takes the weak and makes them strong. He takes the vile and makes them clean. He takes the worthless and makes them worthwhile. He takes the sinful and makes them sinless.

quote: God is in control. He may not take away trials or make detours for us, but He strengthens us through them.

quote: Grief can kill a person emotionally and physically. If not counteracted with God’s strength and power, our personal weakness may debilitate us.

quote: If you let it, pain makes more space for love within you. And the love we carry inside makes us strong when nothing else can

quote: As God is my witness, as God is my witness they’re not going to lick me. I’m going to live through this and when it’s all over, I’ll never be hungry again. No, nor any of my folk. If I have to lie, steal, cheat or kill. As God is my witness, I’ll never be hungry again. - Scarlett
author: Margaret Mitchell, Gone with the Wind

quote: I’ve got more faith in my shotgun than any man, that’s for sure.

quote: As you get older, you have to be willing and able to choose your own path for your life. And once you choose it, you walk it with strength. If you meet evil along the way, know that it is supposed to make you afraid, but it’s not supposed to stop you. You walk through the fear and you walk through the evil, and you don’t let either one become your master.
author: Dan Groat, A Punctual Paymaster

quote: It is beyond my human strength. So, I depend on divine power.

quote: Acknowledge your inner child. Even though we have found the light in ourselves today, we sometimes forget to heal old wounds of our past. Your inner child still needs to be loved in order to heal the complete self.

quote: Find strength in your heartbeat, than weakness with a beat heart. Take each breath as another chance, and love for a new day.

quote: One must avoid snobbery and misanthropy. But one must also be unafraid to criticise those who reach for the lowest common denominator, and who sometimes succeed in finding it. This criticism would be effortless if there were no "people" waiting for just such an appeal. Any fool can lampoon a king or a bishop or a billionaire. A trifle more grit is required to face down a mob, or even a studio audience that has decided it knows what it wants and is entitled to get it. And the fact that kings and bishops and billionaires often have more say than most in forming appetites and emotions of the crowd is not irrelevant, either.
author: Christopher Hitchens, Letters to a Young Contrarian
tags: contrarian, dissent, politics, rebellion, strength, wisdom

quote: For the nearer everything is unto unpassionateness, the nearer it is unto power. And as grief doth proceed from weakness, so doth anger. For both, both he that is angry and grieveth, have received a wound, and cowardly have as it were yielded themselves unto their affections... For it was ordained unto holiness and godliness, which specially consist in an humble submission to God and His providence in all things; as well as unto justice: these also being part of those duties, which as naturally sociable, we are bound unto; and with without which we cannot happily converse one with another: yea and the very ground and fountain indeed of all just actions.
author: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus, Meditations

quote: Be curious, confident and courageous.

quote: You have that boy on such a high pedestal. It’s far too slippery up there for one so unprincipled as a solitary fae. It’s not as if I haven’t tried to drag him down. I looked inside his soul. Hoped to find his weaknesses. Only to discover that even those could be considered strengths under the right circumstances.
author: A.G. Howard, Ensnared

quote: YOUR GREATER ANIMALThey say that if you areEver confronted byA lion or bear,To never act scared.Instead act likeYou are the greater animalAnd that they'reThe hareThat you are aboutTo tear.This has beenProvenAnd compared.This is how presidentsAre lovedAnd feared.Each one of us has an animalWithin usThat is armed withMental,Physical orSpiritual giftsThat could shoot spearsThrough the air.So next timeYou are confronted inA fight that seems unfair,Just remember the lion and the bear.MAGNIFYYour greater animalAnd all that feel your magnificenceWill quickly step awayAnd disappear.

tags: animal, armed, bear, confidence, fear, feared, fears, fight, gifts, greater-animal, greatness, growth, imbalanced, insecure, insecurity, lion, love, loved, magnificence, mental, physical, president, shoot, size, spark, spear, spirit, spiritual, spirituality, strength, unfair

quote: To shift a few grains of sand is no more a sign of great strength than to see the sun a sign of great sight. There is no glory in dominating the weak.
author: Peter V. Brett, The Desert Spear
tags: dominating, glory, grains, great, sand, shift, sight, sign, strength, sun, weak

quote: Weakness or strength: there you are, strength. You do not know where you are going, nor why you are going; enter anywhere, reply to anything. They will no more kill you than if you were a corpse.” In the morning I had a look so lost, a face so dead, that perhaps those whom I met did not see me.In cities, suddenly, the mud seemed red and black like a mirror when the lamp moves about in the adjoining room, like a treasure in the forest! Good luck, I cried, and I saw a sea of flames and smoke in the sky; to the right, to the left all the riches of the world flaming like a billion thunder-bolts.
author: Arthur Rimbaud, A Season in Hell/The Drunken Boat

quote: Once you have endured sufferings, you can give someone strength.

quote: Back turned, you don't have to look at what you've left behind. And the person who first turned their back on you can't watch you break down and cry. Never allow an enemy to see weakness in you.
author: Ellen Hopkins, Perfect

quote: In social life we hardly stop to consider how much of that daring spirit which gives mastery comes from hardness of heart rather than from high purpose, or true courage. The man who succumbs to his wife, the mother who succumbs to her daughter, the master who succumbs to his servant, is as often brought to servility by a continual aversion to the giving of pain, by a softness which causes the fretfulness of others to be an agony to himself,—as by any actual fear which the firmness of the imperious one may have produced. There is an inner softness, a thinness of the mind's skin, an incapability of seeing or even thinking of the troubles of others with equanimity, which produces a feeling akin to fear; but which is compatible not only with courage, but with absolute firmness of purpose, when the demand for firmness arises so strongly as to assert itself.
author: Anthony Trollope

quote: Poverty entails fear, and stress, and sometimes depression; it means a thousand petty humiliations and hardships. Climbing out of poverty by your own efforts, that is indeed something on which to pride yourself, but poverty itself is romanticised only by fools.
author: J.K. Rowling, Very Good Lives: The Fringe Benefits of Failure and the Importance of Imagination

quote: So why do I talk about the benefits of failure? Simply because failure meant a stripping away of the inessential. I stopped pretending to myself that I was anything other than what I was, and began to direct all my energy into finishing the only work that mattered to me. Had I really succeeded at anything else, I might never have found the determination to succeed in the one arena I believed I truly belonged. I was set free, because my greatest fear had been realised, and I was still alive, and I still had a daughter whom I adored, and I had an old typewriter and a big idea. And so rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
author: J.K. Rowling, Very Good Lives: The Fringe Benefits of Failure and the Importance of Imagination

quote: I shall never forget the African torture victim, a young man no older than I was at the time, who had become mentally ill after all he had endured in his homeland. He trembled uncontrollably as he spoke into a video camera about the brutality inflicted upon him. He was a foot taller than I was, and seemed as fragile as a child. I was given the job of escorting him back to the Underground Station afterwards, and this man whose life had been shattered by cruelty took my hand with exquisite courtesy, and wished me future happiness.
author: J.K. Rowling, Very Good Lives: The Fringe Benefits of Failure and the Importance of Imagination

quote: Failure gave me an inner security that I had never attained by passing examinations.
author: J.K. Rowling, Very Good Lives: The Fringe Benefits of Failure and the Importance of Imagination

quote: Next to the dragon, and connected with it, water is the most frequently used symbol in Taosim. It is the strength in apparent weakness, the fluidity of life, an also symbolic of the state of coolness of judgment, acceptance and passionlessness, as opposed to the heat of argument, the friction of opposition, and the emotion of desire. Water fertilizes, refreshes and purifies and it is symbolic of gentle persuasion in government of the state and the individual. It occupies the lowest position, yet is the most powerful of forces. The highest goodness in like water.
author: J.C. Cooper
tags: buddhism, inspirational, religion, strength, tao, taosim, water

quote: You are on the floor crying,and you have been on the floor crying for days.And that is you being brave.That is you getting through itas best you know how. No one else can decideWhat your tough looks like.
author: Clementine von Radics

quote: Become like the sun. If you do so, all darkness will be dispelled. No matter what happens, live confidently with the conviction that you, yourself are the “sun.” Of course, in life there are sunny days and cloudy days. But even on cloudy days, the sun is still there. Even when you are suffering, it is vital that you strive to keep the sun shining brightly in your heart.

quote: Sometimes it felt like no one was ever there for her. Everyone thought she was so strong. And she was, for the most part. But that didn’t mean she never needed anyone to lean on.

quote: A small kindness, a confluence of compassion, had saved his life. Was that strength, or a weakness?

quote: The strength I'm looking for isn't the type where you win or lose. I'm not after a wall that'll repel power coming from outside. What I want us the kind of strength to be able to absorb that kind of power, to stand up to it. The strength to quietly endure things - unfairness, misfortunes, sadness, mistakes, misunderstandings.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: No, Zahra, dear, no! Gentleness isn’t weakness.’ Her hand, suspended in midair, trembled with emptiness and fell to her side. ‘How easy it is to be bitter or angry; that’s when you’re at your weakest! But when you choose to be kind, to forget your hurt, that’s when you find within the greatest strength of all.’ She smiled, oh, a smile of such ancient wisdom, her face shone with love. She waited, but when I wouldn’t smile back, she walked past me.
author: Judy Croome, Dancing in the Shadows of Love

quote: Writing can be a source of strength-Wang Liang

quote: Some are drawn to the light of your strength but can't handle the darkness of your weaknesses. If they run when the light gets dim, don't chase them. They have no understanding of how dark is necessary for light to shine its brightest.

quote: She’d lost so much in the process of becoming Zyne, but somewhere in the middle of it all, she’d found herself. Her heritage had shattered her illusions of a tranquil life. Destiny swept behind in a blaze, decimating everything she tried to hold on to. She was left alone, like the solitary tree standing after a forest fire. She’d thought she would crumble to ash, just another memory on the wind. But as blackened pieces of her cracked and fell away, she saw the truth. Under all that charred wreckage was the heartwood. Bruised. Scarred. But still good. Still capable of growth. When she looked in the mirror, she no longer saw a victim, but a survivor.
author: Gwen Mitchell, Rain of Ash
tags: grief-and-loss, growth, healing-the-past, love, strength, survivor, transformation

quote: As you walk your various paths, walk with faith. Speak affirmatively and cultivate an attitude of confidence. You have the capacity to do so. Your strength will give strength to others. Do not partake of the spirit so rife in our times. Rather look for good and build upon it. There is so much of the strong and the decent and the beautiful to build upon. You are partakers of the gospel of Jesus Christ. The gospel means "good news." The message of the Lord is one of hope and salvation. The voice of the Lord is a voice of glad tidings. The work of the Lord is a work of glorious accomplishment.

quote: The Warrior Woman Code:A confident woman doesn't beg a man to stay, cry if they don't or need to tear down other women to be loved. She knows her value. When the person she is meant to be with finds her, that person will know it also. He won't be confused by it. He will fight for her because without her he feels incomplete. She will always be foremost in his mind above anyone else. She doesn't have to scheme to keep or entice him. She is okay walking away from him because she doesn't want to be seen as a choice or a woman that has some potential. She demands to be seen as "the one." To settle for anything less than that is an admission of insecurity and lack of self love.

quote: Releasing a slow breath, she raised her chin and finally turned her gaze on Qureshi. The moment their gazes connected she felt a surge of power go through her. Throughout her nine hellish months of captivity, she’d been forbidden to look him in the eye. She’d known better than to even try, because she’d known what would happen to her if she did. But they weren’t in Afghanistan anymore and he was no longer the one calling the shots. She held the authority now. Her life, her opinions, had value here. And her voice, silenced for so long, would now speak for all the victims unable to. Her voice would not only be heard here in this courtroom—it would be his undoing.Qureshi stared back at her with an insolent, almost bored disdain on his scratched face, making it clear what he thought of her. To him she was nothing but an infidel whore, a commodity less valuable than a goat or mule, to be bought and sold whenever it suited him, handed out to one of his soldiers as a prize of war. Well this infidel whore is about to bury you, you son of a bitch. Holding that cold, hateful gaze in the taut, hushed silence that filled the courtroom, she sent him another silent message. Let him see it in her eyes. You didn’t break me. I’m no longer afraid of you. You no longer have the power to hurt me or anyone I care about. And by God, I’ll make sure you never have the chance to hurt anyone else again.
author: Kaylea Cross, Avenged

quote: How one responds in these dire circumstances says a lot about one's faith and the strength of one's beliefs.

quote: A quiet peacefulness stole through him, dimming the sharp sense of loss. His arms contracted around her, the pressure fierce. “I’m coming to find you once the trial’s over,” he murmured against the top of her head. She kissed his chest. “You’d better.” “We’re not done,” he told her. “Not by a long shot.” She hummed in agreement and caressed his chest with her fingertips. Nate stroked the length of her spine, savoring the silky texture of her skin. He missed her already and she was still lying naked in his arms. “Just a few more days and this’ll all be over.” “Don’t make me wait too long, okay?” “I won’t.” He leaned his head back, tipped her chin up with one hand until she met his eyes. If there was even a tiny part of her that doubted his intentions, he wanted that cleared up now. “I’ve never felt like this about anyone before.” Her eyes softened and she smiled that serene smile that soothed him deep inside. “Me neither.” He could drown in this woman and die a happy man. He admired her so damn much. “You’re strong, baby. So much stronger than you even realize. You’ve got this.” “Have I got you, though?” Normally the question would have freaked him out. Hearing it from her made him feel insanely possessive. “Yeah, you’ve got me, baby.” He was falling so hard and so fast, and it didn’t even faze him. “Then I can handle everything else on my own,” she whispered, and pulled his mouth down to hers.
author: Kaylea Cross, Avenged

quote: Don’t you understand? You are Elder. When you take my role as Eldest, you must dedicate your whole life to this one idea: you are the caretaker of every single person on the ship. You must always be everything to everyone on board.

quote: I do not subscribe to the abuse "victim" or "survivor" mentality. I have experienced every kind of abuse imaginable and I am and always have been the most happy go-lucky, positive and life affirming person around. quote: It is not because men’s desires are strong that they act ill; it is because their consciences are weak. There is no natural connection between strong impulses and a weak conscience. The natural connection is the other way. To say that one person’s desires and feelings are stronger and more various than those of another, is merely to say that he has more of the raw material of human nature, and is therefore capable, perhaps of more evil, but certainly of more good. Strong impulses are but another name for energy.
