quote: In the moment we're born, we're drawn to form a union with others. An abiding drive to connect, to love, to belong. In a perfect union, we find the strength we cannot find in ourselves. But the strength of the union cannot be known until it is tested.
author: Emily Thorne
tags: belong, connect, love, revenge, revenge-tv-series, strength, tested, union

quote: But the fact is, dreams catch us with our armor off.
author: Victoria Schwab, The Unbound

quote: It takes strength to remember, it takes another kind of strength to forget, it takes a hero to do both. People who remember court madness through pain, the pain of the perpetually recurring death of their innocence; people who forget court another kind of madness, the madness of the denial of pain and the hatred of innocence; and the world is mostly divided between madmen who remember and madmen who forget. Heroes are rare.
author: James     Baldwin, Giovanni's Room
tags: hero, heroes, innocence, madness, memory, strength

quote: A deep kiss can put you in an emotional state of coma, sometimes in a reckless vulnerability, we lose virginity and sanity, and maybe our bond of love becomes strong or weak.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
tags: bond, coma, defilement, emotion, emotional-state, forgetfulness, french-kiss, kiss, kissing, love, lust, michael-bassey-johnson, strength, strong, virginity, weak, weakness

quote: She reminded him that the weak will never enter the kingdom of love, which is a harsh and ungenerous kingdom,and that women give themselves only to men of resolute spirit, who provide them with the security they need in order to face life.
author: Gabriel García Márquez, Love in the Time of Cholera

quote: Strength conquers weakness through force. Weakness conquers strength through seduction,the look and feel of ease, the illusion of rest without responsibility,and the hallucination of unaccountability in general.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: Weakness employs many weapons in its perpetual war against strength. True strength does not attack; it is too busy enduring attacks, and defending itself against weakness.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: Your strength is beyond your own imagination.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: You don't have to be strong, because the strength is in you; it's in your DNA, in your soul and your essence.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: It has often given my pleasure to observe, that independent America was not composed of detached and distant territories, but that one connected fertile, wide-spreading country was the portion of our western sons of liberty. Providence has in a particular manner blessed it with a variety of soils and productions, and watered it with innumerable streams, for the delight and accommodation of its inhabitants. A succession of navigable waters form a kind of chain round its borders, as if to bind them together; while the most noble rivers in the world, running at convenient distances, present them with highways for the easy communication of friendly aids, and the mutual transportation of their various ties. With equal pleasure I have as often taken notice, that Providence has been pleased to give us this one connected country to one united people -a people descended from the same ancestors, speaking the same language, professing the same religion, attached to the same principles of government, very similar in their manners and customs, and who, by they their joint counsels, arms, and efforts, fighting side by side throughout a long and bloody war, have nobly established general liberty and independence.
author: John Jay, The Federalist Papers

quote: You know, life fractures all of us into little pieces. It harms us, but it’s how we glue those fractures back together that makes us stronger.
author: Carrie Jones, Entice

quote: Your suffering is here to help you unfold and to awaken into compassion, love and strength.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: In your serenity there is a clarity, strength and correctness that is beyond the petty scuffles of the moment — a greater truth. It is the truth of who you are; beautiful, calm, secure, open, willing and safe.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life
tags: beauty, calmness, clarity, correctness, greatness, safety, serenity, spirituality, strength, truth

quote: I know I have the body of a weak, feeble woman; but I have the heart and stomach of a king
author: Elizabeth I

quote: I believe in love. I believe it transforms, transports, and transcends. I believe it fine-tunes goodness, solidifies strength, ripens resolve, eradicates rage, alleviates stress, and elevates empathy.
author: Lisa Kogan
tags: belief, empathy, goodness, love, resolve, strength, stress

quote: A man has the strength to face what he is thrown in life. If he falls or is beaten, he does not complain but gets up and rides in to face the challenge once more.
author: Cheryl Matthynssens, The Blackguard

quote: It takes strong, sound leadership, that correspondingly rare commodity, which is afflicted with neither an excess of pity nor callousness, to stand against the insipid tide of superficiality that is sweeping the world.
author: Tim Macartney-Snape

quote: Your will has to be stronger than your excuses. Your will has to be stronger than your fear.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Your pain is a divine rite of passage through which you will be reborn as a being of strength, wisdom and purpose.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: To move forth and grab your destiny is admirable. To shape your own future with the strength in your fist is beyond that.
author: S.A. Bouraleh

quote: Life is ever reaching for strength, vitality, survival and the fulfillment of perpetuating its inherent message of continuance.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life
tags: continuance, fullfillment, life, messages, perpetration, strength, survivalism, vitality

quote: You will not be the same after the storms of life; you will be stronger, wiser and more alive than ever before!
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: You have the heart of a warrior and you were designed to survive!
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: He reached out a long arm and drew me in, holding me close against him. I put my arms around him and felt the quiver of his muscles, exhausted, and the sheer hard strength still in him, that would hold him up, no matter how tired he might be. We stood quite still for some time, my cheek against his chest and his face against my hair, drawing strength from each other for whatever might come next. Being married.
author: Diana Gabaldon, Written in My Own Heart's Blood

quote: Until then we're going to keep making memories like this, moments when we're the only two people in the whole world. And when we get scared or lonely or confused, we'll pull out these memories and wrap them around us and they'll make us feel safe. And strong.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson, The Impossible Knife of Memory
tags: coping, encouragement, loneliness, memories, safe, scared, strength

quote: I can still make a fist, and breath still burns in my chest. So look at my face. Look at my mortal soul, and remember it. You did not crush me, and you will have the rest of eternity to think on it.
author: Susan Dennard, Strange and Ever After

quote: Real strength isn’t control. It’s knowing when to let go.
author: Christopher Barzak, The Love We Share Without Knowing

quote: The self-esteem one acquires and a well-earned feeling of one's strength are the only consolation in this world. Income, after all, most brutes have that.
author: Paul Gauguin, The Writings of a Savage

quote: We shall become, or we shall overcome.
author: Anthony Liccione
tags: become, come-to-be, endure, obstacles, overcome, settle, strength

quote: Waiting with hope is very difficult, but true patience is expressed when we must even wait for hope. I will have reached the point of greatest strength once I have learned to wait for hope." George Matheson
author: George Matheson

quote: Never underestimate the collective strength of your weakest connections.
author: Ryan Lilly, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

quote: Be the Kind of Woman that when Your Feet Hit the Floor Each Morning, the Devil Says, ‘Oh Crap, She’s Up!
author: Anonymous

quote: Rather than assuming weakness or defectiveness, we should acknowledge that getting through depression requires considerable strength. Rather than assuming permanent debility, we should recognize that some depressions are followed by thriving.
author: Jonathan Rottenberg, The Depths: The Evolutionary Origins of the Depression Epidemic

quote: There were times my heart broke into painful fragments then my soul perseveringly gathered an ocean of strength on my voyage towards renewal.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul

quote: Meet struggle and master it, says nature, and you shall have strength and wisdom sufficient for all your needs.
author: Napoleon Hill, You Can Work Your Own Miracles

quote: He lay still, his bloodshot eyes staring blankly before him, and drifted into dreams of his problems, compulsively living out dialogues, summing up emotional scenes with his mother, Dot, and his friends. Repeatedly he chided himself to go to sleep, but it did no good, for he was hungry for these waking visions that depicted his dilemmas, yet he knew that such brooding did not help; in fact he was wasting his waning strength, for into these unreal dramas he was putting the whole of his ardent being. The long hours dragged on.
author: Richard Wright, The Outsider

quote: If it's about the strength, every big animal can catch any mouse... but the skillful brand of the cat makes it's catch exceptional! Go, get the skills!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes
tags: animal, be-skilled, big, big-animal, brand, cat, cat-and-mouse, catch, excel, excellent, exceptional, food-for-thought, israelmore-ayivor, learn, mouse, skillful, skillfulness, skills, strength, strong, unique

quote: It's these small differences in people's karma that determine if we get up or remain lying on the ground.
author: Peter Høeg, The Quiet Girl
tags: determination, determine, differences, fall, getting-up, ground, karma, lying-down, people, small, strength

quote: It takes some strength to fight. It takes greater strength to choose not to fight.
author: Philip Gerard Oning

quote: I've never believed in living for the ones you love. I believe in the power of death, I'd die for the ones that I love.
author: Anna Van Breugel
tags: books, death, friendship, inspiration, love, strength

quote: Moments of prayer intruded on by sloth cannot be made up. We may get experience, but we cannot get back the rich freshness and strength which were wrapped up in those moments.
author: Frederick W. Robertson

quote: Strength, both physical and spiritual, is the product of struggle!
author: Napoleon Hill, You Can Work Your Own Miracles

quote: Hope. It is the quintessential human delusion, simultaneously the source of your greatest strength, and greatest weakness.
author: Unknown or The Archictect from the Matrix reloaded movie

quote: Your castles and strongholds shall have bars of iron and bronze, and as your day, so shall your strength, your rest and security, be.” Deuteronomy 33:25 AMP
author: Anonymous, Deuteronomy

quote: Well, I am sure, for we do not achieve this by ourselves, but by the strength of StarClan within us.
author: Erin Hunter, Moonrise
tags: cinderpelt, leafpaw, moonrise, starclan, strength, warriors

quote: When you carry someone else's baggage, it's nearly impossible to get rid of your own. Drop it. Now.
author: Cathryn Louis

quote: He's the strongest man in the w
author: Astrid Lindgren, Pippi Longstocking

quote: You are entitled to your opinion but you are not entitled to dictate mine.
author: Michelle N. Onuorah
tags: conviction, faith, freedom, inspirational, opinion, opinions-of-others, strength

quote: People will tell you that you’re broken. Don’t believe them. They were not the person that could help you. They have not walked your path. God has got a plan to bring people into your life that have lived through a similar hell. In the end, it isn’t the number of people that are on your side. It is the people that understand what your side is that matters.
author: Shannon L. Alder
tags: answers, broken, faith, guardian-angel, have-faith, hell-to-well, hope, love, mental-disorders, pray, prayer, stay-strong, strength, trust

quote: Clary saw him take Mark's hand; he pressed his witchlight into the boy's palm, where it flickered, and then resumed its steady glow. 'Take this with you,' said Jace, 'for it can be dark in the land under the hill, and the years very long.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Heavenly Fire

quote: Fire can destroy or purify, strengthen or weaken, all depending on the nature of the material being burned. Pain has the same effects on the human soul, and for the same reasons.
author: Lance Conrad, The Price of Creation

quote: Once you commit and decide that there is no turning back, you’ll find the strength.
author: Marta Mrotek, Miracle in Progress: A Handbook for Holistic Recovery
tags: commitment, decisions, hope, inspiration, recovery, strength

quote: If I'm able to use my voice to do good in the world then I definitely want to do that.
author: Demi Lovato
tags: demi-lovato, good, message, outspoken, strength, voice

quote: ...I hope that simple love and truth will be strong in the end. I hope that real love and truth are stronger in the end than any evil or misfortune in the world.
author: Charles Dickens, David Copperfield

quote: Part of the strength of science is that it has tended to attract individuals who love knowledge and the creation of it. ... Thus, it is the communication process which is at the core of the vitality and integrity of science.
author: Philip Abelson
tags: attraction, communication, creation, integrity, knowledge, love, process, science, strength, vitality

quote: Every day, strive to refine your contagious shine, and shake the nonsense offered by those who lack the will to polish-up from within.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"
tags: glow, nonsense, refine, refined, refinement, shine, shine-bright, strength, strength-of-character, will, will-power

quote: Arrogance convinced me that by sheer determination, I could conquer helplessness itself. Stubborn and foolish youth, I must admit, for when I look back on those years now, I see quite clearly that rarely did I stand alone. Always there were friends, true and dear, lending me support even when I believed I did not want it, and even when I did not realize they were doing it. ...These were the companions who justified my principles, who gave me strength to continue against any foe, real or imagined. These were the companions who fought the helplessness, the rage, and frustration. These were the friends who gave me my life.
author: R.A. Salvatore

quote: God doesn't mock us. He never gives us a goal that we cannot accomplish in His strength. I want to assure you, you can glorify God, you MUST glorify God. But you have to determine deep within your heart that you're going to do it His way.
author: Charles R. Swindoll, Rise & Shine: A Wake Up Call

quote: Do you feel like your action plans are stronger to than your capability? Just take a moment a draw a plan of how to deal with the difficult task with a single bite at each time. Go slow, but sure!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes
tags: action-plans, actions, bite, capability, capable, day-by-day, deal, difficult, difficulty, draw-a-plan, feel, go-slow, israelmore-ayivor, little, make-a-deal, make-a-plan, moment, plan-your-life, plans, single, single-bite, small-small, strength, strong, stronger, strongest, sure, tasks

quote: The most important part of discernment is pinpointing the forces to be reckoned with, both the constructive and destructive.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
tags: constructive, destructive, discernment, force, force-to-be-reckoned-with, judgment, pinpoint, strength

quote: All thinking things fear. Sentience, perhaps, is facing that fear and conquering it rather than succumbing. A tiger will drown in a tar pit, but a man who can clear his thoughts may survive.
author: C.E. Murphy, Hands of Flame

quote: Roar to your own beat!
author: Janet Autherine, Growing into Greatness with God: 7 Paths to Greatness for our Sons and Daughters

quote: Challenge each problem you face with purposeful thought and determined action. Resolve that 'every' situation you encounter will make you better, stronger, wiser, more skillful and more loving.
author: Steve Brunkhorst
tags: asttitude, growth, love, problems, skill, strength, wisdom

quote: The men at the top aren't that great at properly assessing the women under them, certainly not enough to gauge their potential or intestinal fortitude.
author: Charlotte Beers, I'd Rather Be in Charge: A Legendary Business Leader's Roadmap for Achieving Pride, Power, and Joy at Work

quote: Be strong. It is our adversity that leads us to our character.
author: Jennifer Megan Varnadore

quote: Xavier stares past her with watery eyes. 'Why does the world feel the need to drop its weight upon my shoulders?' he barely whispers. His mother strokes his hair.'Maybe it believes you can handle it,' she tells him. 'That though it is heavy, you are strong enough to carry it.
author: Damiana, Untitled
tags: carry, heavy, meredith, mother, shoulders, strength, strong, weight, world, xavier

quote: Fighting physically signifies spiritual weakness.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson, Classic Quotations From The Otherworlds
tags: combat, fight, fighting, insecurity, materialism, spirit, spiritual-battle, spirituality, strength, weakness

quote: Sometimes life is not kind, and most times we have to hurt deeply in order to find out how strong and determined we really are.
author: Yara Greathouse, Unavoidable

quote: My mother wasn't a fool," I say. "She just understood something you didn't. That it's not sacrifice if it's someone else's life you're giving away, it's just evil."I back up another step and say, "She taught me all about real sacrifice. That it should be done from love, not misplaced disgust for another person's genetics. That it should be done from necessity, not without exhausting all other options. That it should be done for people who need your strength because they don't have enough of their own. ...
author: Veronica Roth, Allegiant
tags: allegiant, love, sacrifice, strength, tris, veronica-roth

quote: Love is when unknowingly I am moving to a world of no return, Where my desire and your fragrance together burnall your thoughts in canvas of my mind and soulturns in to a masterpiece as my life's aim and goal looks I am taken over and over away by you showering in me as a rain of you and only you
author: Seema Gupta
tags: attributed-no-source, broken-heart, deep-love, divine-love, friends, heartbreak, inspirational, life, lonely, love, passion, passionate-love, strength

quote: If you take a hard look at the people in your life, you may be blown away by how many explorers and survivalists surround you. Everyday, I'm amazed by the number of people I meet, who have climbed Mt. Everest, time and time again...without ever having been to the Himalayas.
author: José N. Harris, Mi Vida
tags: challenge, courage, endurance, hardship, strength, strength-through-adversity

quote: Prayer is only another name for good, clean, direct thinking. When you pray, think well what you are saying, and make your thoughts into things that are solid. In that manner, your prayer will have strength, and that strength shall become part of you, mind, body, and spirit.
author: Richard Llewellyn, How Green Was My Valley

quote: You augment your strength every time you overcome obstacles. Discover and use that unique potential you have in coping well in a positive way no matter how worst the situation can be.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul

quote: Who am I? They often tell me I would step from my cell's confinement calmly, cheerfully, firmly, like a squire from his country-house.Who am I? They often tell me I would talk to my warden freely and friendly and clearly, as though it were mine to command.Who am I? They also tell me I would bear the days of misfortune equably, smilingly, proudly, like one accustomed to win.Am I then really all that which other men tell of, or am I only what I know of myself, restless and longing and sick, like a bird in a cage, struggling for breath, as though hands were compressing my throat, yearning for colors, for flowers, for the voices of birds, thirsting for words of kindness, for neighborliness, trembling with anger at despotisms and petty humiliation, tossing in expectation of great events, powerlessly trembling for friends at an infinite distance, weary and empty at praying, at thinking, at making, faint and ready to say farewell to it all.Who am I? This or the other? Am I one person today, and tomorrow another? Am I both at once? A hypocrite before others, and before myself a contemptibly woebegone weakling? Or is something within me still like a beaten army, fleeing in disorder from victory already achieved?Who am I? They mock me, these lonely questions of mine.Whoever I am, Thou knowest, O God, I am thine!
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer, Prison Poems
tags: depression, god, life, loneliness, longing, meaning, sadness, strength, weakness, woebegone

quote: To be at peace, does not mean that you are amiss of every storm, it only means that you can find a calm within the storm.
author: Tania Elizabeth, The Tier of Eternal Grace: The Souls Cry

quote: Even the strongest, most well-built team will, at times, be met with adversity.  What makes us great is not that we should anticipate less adversity the stronger that we become, but rather that in anticipation of adversity we become stronger.”  -Michael Joling
author: Michael Joling

quote: Strength?” “Safety,” I said. And in that moment I realized that I’d always equated the two in my head, but they weren’t the same thing. Sometimes people were strongest at their most vulnerable, dangerous moments.
author: Kate Avery Ellison, Frost

quote: Someone's weaknesses are the strength which allows them to be human.
author: M (Michelle) Carithers

quote: Nietzsche was the one who did the job for me. At a certain moment in his life,the idea came to him of what he called 'the love of your fate.' Whatever your fate is, whatever the hell happens, you say, 'This is what I need.' It may look like a wreck, but go at it as though it were an opportunity, a challenge. If you bring love to that moment--not discouragement--you will find the strength is there. Any disaster you can survive is an improvement in your character, your stature, and your life. What a privilege! This is when the spontaneity of your own nature will have a chance to flow.Then, when looking back at your life, you will see that the moments which seemed to be great failures followed by wreckage were the incidents that shaped the life you have now. You’ll see that this is really true. Nothing can happen to you that is not positive. Even though it looks and feels at the moment like a negative crisis, it is not. The crisis throws you back, and when you are required to exhibit strength, it comes.
author: Joseph Campbell, A Joseph Campbell Companion: Reflections on the Art of Living
tags: acceptance, fate, growth, life, love, nietzsche, positivity, strength

quote: Control is the basis of all true power. Authority and strength are matters of perception
author: Brandon Sanderson, Words of Radiance
tags: authority, control, jasnah-kholin, perception, power, strength

quote: Dare to be strong and courageous. That is the road. Venture anything. Be brave enough to dare to be loved.
author: Sherwood Anderson, Winesburg, Ohio

quote: Love is An invited deal for losing peace
author: Seema Gupta
tags: attributed-no-source, broken-heart, deep-love, friends, heartbreak, inspirational, life, love, passion, passionate-love, strength

quote: My Mother - AmmaHer touch was my solace,Her smile did encourage,Her love was my strength,Her stare, I fully decant,Her care was my power,Her joy was my shower,Her anger corrected my path,Her laughter filled my heart,Her silence made me ponder,Her glare was my reminder,Her scorn corrected my track,Her embrace I never did lack.
author: Munindra Misra, Chants of Hindu Gods and Godesses in English Rhyme
tags: embrace, emotion, encourage, heart, love, mother, power, reminder, solace, strength

quote: It's her ability as an artist to see possibility where others see a blank page and, by extension, to see victory where others see certain defeat that truly empowers her...
author: Sarah Cross, Shadowhunters and Downworlders: A Mortal Instruments Reader

quote: It is one thing to be brave in front of others, perhaps for fear of being branded a coward and becoming diminished in their eyes, but another entirely to be brave when there is nobody to witness your courage. The latter is an elemental bravery, a strength of spirit and character.
author: John Connolly, The Infernals
tags: brave, bravery, character, courage, courageous, strength, strength-of-character, strong

quote: the power to cause pain is the only power that matters, the power to kill and destroy, because if you can't kill then you are always subject to those who can, and nothing and one will ever save you.
author: Orson Scott Card, Ender's Game

quote: It takes courage to speak up for your beliefs.
author: Jim George
tags: beliefs, blessed, christian, courage, courageous, faith, god, mature, speak, speak-up, strength, strong, take

quote: At times it may feel hopeless. That life is unforgiving. Breathe. In the hopelessness of life, we find hope and promise. We find strength.
author: Tania Elizabeth, The Tier of Eternal Grace: The Moon Clearing
tags: hope, inspiration, inspirational-quote, promise, strength, truth

quote: Sometimes we have to dig a little deeper, to reach a little higher.
author: A.C. Anderson

quote: Confidence is that internal alignment between what you know, what you believe and what you portray.
author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders
tags: character, confidence, inspirational, integrity, motivational, strength

quote: When the fuel is dried up in a vehicle, it stops driving automatically. You are a vehicle in the spiritual and the physical world, so you need some oil for alacrity, in order to get to your destination. The greater the quantity of your oil, the more you cover the distance, and the more you cover the distance, the closer you get to your success.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
tags: ability, achievement, alacrity, car, competition, conquer, conquering, destination, destiny, distance, energy, fast, fastness, flying-high, game, gravitation, greater-heights, greatness, making-money, maximization, michael-bassey-johnson, mystic, mysticism, oil, power, soaring, spiritual-journey, spirituality, strength, success, talent, toil, transcendence, vehicle, win, winning, work-hard

quote: Divine love""Don't Leave me, ONLYTo carry my body on my two feet I need you
author: Seema Gupta
tags: attributed-no-source, broken-heart, deep-love, divine-love, friends, heartbreak, inspirational, life, lonely, love, passion, passionate-love, strength

quote: Fate refuses to stop at the pretty part of the tale; Fate insists on more tests of courage and wit, a terrible end, even if the heroine's heart be pure and her crime accidental.
author: Susann Cokal, The Kingdom of Little Wounds

quote: Rise up, empower yourself and take a step. The only way to know that you still have some amount of strength in you when you fall is to attempt to rise up. However if you believe you don't have any strength, you will remain where you are!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes
tags: amount, attempt, belief, believe, empower, empowerment, fall, food-for-thought, israelmore-ayivor, know, powerful, remain-where-you-are, rise-again, rise-up, still, strength, take-a-step, way, you-are-empowered, you-are-powerful, yourself

quote: Recovery itself is a very un-glamorous daily process of being willing to fall down again, to break again, to cry again, to get up and try yet again until ‘success’ manifests as ever-greater sustained healing.
author: Shannon Cutts, Beating Ana: How to Outsmart Your Eating Disorder and Take Your Life Back

quote: Gain strength through adversity…!
author: James A. Murphy, The Waves of Life Quotes and Daily Meditations

quote: Revealing of origin , evidence the existence of hidden pearls in mind which is addicted to imagine and thought as well.
author: Seema Gupta
tags: attributed-no-source, broken-heart, deep-love, divine-love, friends, heartbreak, inspirational, life, lonely, love, passion, passionate-love, strength

quote: In my life, I have but one anchor and that anchor is my God. I think if you look closely enough, you can even see it in my eyes, you'll see a strong place, an anchor. That is God.
author: C. JoyBell C.
tags: anchor-of-my-soul, god, inspirational-quotes, inspirational-spiritual, my-god, strength

quote: Devi-Mahatmayam has special meaning for spirituality, With illumination, wisdom, strength - to freedom finally!- 150 -
author: Munindra Misra, Devi Mahatmayam in English Rhyme
tags: devi-mahatmayam, durga, freedom, illumination, saptashati, spirituality, strength, wisdom

quote: When a man is at his weakest is where he will find the greatest opportunity to become his strongest.
author: Calvin W. Allison, Growing in the Presence of God

quote: I know, I know. You're a badass. The best of the best. But everyone has a weakness. Even you.
author: Lindsey Allyson, Time Travel

quote: Life must be lived at the right time. Death is not scary when one dies after having lived fully. One must choose to live though and face all adversities.
author: Massimo Marino, Daimones

quote: There is no substitute for the strength that blesses a couple when they work together.
author: Elizabeth George
tags: bless, blesses, christian, couple, god, strength, substitute, together, work

quote: Take a few minutes.""No. He's already had more of my time than he was entitled to."Yes, he thought as she walked out of his office. Very much like her grandmother.
author: Nora Roberts, The Villa

quote: Temper is a valuable possession,Never lose it with your obsession,The best way to win a fight,- Do not be mad – it’s not right.Temper is the strength of all,Distemper – weakness and fall,Tempered steel – strong and grit,Distempered iron – weak and brit.
author: Munindra Misra, PT. Kanhaiya Lal Misra - My Father

quote: Let out your heat!Unleash your imaginationLet the burning fragrance of your unimpeachable imaginationsparkle through the morning’s you.At night, let the stoical sweat of your day ease your musclesRelax your feet.You will need them to walk again tomorrow
author: Priscilla Koranteng, Trails to the Stream: Poetry and Inspiration for Everyday Living
tags: leadership, living, living-life, motivation, strength, success, successful-living

quote: I am an explorer,' she whispered, 'setting courageously off into the wild unknown.' It was not a daydream she'd ever had before, but she felt the familiar comfort of her imagination wrapping around her. She was an archeologist, a scientist, a treasure hunter. She was a master of land and sea. 'My life is an adventure.' she said, growing confident as she opened her eyes again. 'I will not be shackled to this satellite anymore.'Thorne tilted his head to one side. He waited for three heartbeats before sliding one hand down into hers. 'I have no idea what you're talking about,' he said. 'But we'll go with it.
author: Marissa Meyer, Cress

quote: People are going to come into your life, and God is going to use them to help you. To them you’re insignificant and don’t matter. They are not going to understand you, or even see the point of why God had you hang in there with them for so long. Remember this: Sometimes meeting someone has nothing to do with what you can provide for him or her and everything to do with what God needs you to recognize in that person. If you didn’t understand the message, God will keep sending the same person or situation into your life.
author: Shannon L. Alder
tags: answers, assistance, awareness, bravery, chance, dating, direction, divine-interventions, faith, fate, guidance, hang-on, help, holy-ghost, illness, lessons-learned, life-lessons, life-missions, life-purpose, listen, marriage, messages, miracles, no-coincidences, open-mindedness, patterns, plans, purpose, recognize, relationships, revelation, significance, signs, strength, symbols

quote: It occurred to him that strength was quite different from toughness and that being vulnerable wasn't quite the same as being weak.
author: Michelle Magorian, Goodnight Mister Tom

quote: Chances are no matter how bad your troubles seem to be, someone somewhere, with less resilience, has successfully conquered a more severe version of your problems.
author: Gary   Hopkins
tags: big-picture, courageous, empowerment, fearless, fortitude, independence, resilience, self-reliance, strength, strength-through-adversity

quote: Any coward can instill fear. It's easy to scare people, but having the strength to make them feel safe? Now that's power.
author: Nick Shamhart
tags: advice, humanity, inspirational, perspective, philosophy, power, strength

quote: While we may continue to use the wordssmart and stupid, and while IQ tests may persist for certain purposes, the monopolyof those who believe in a single general intelligence has come to an end. Brain scientists and geneticists are documentingthe incredible differentiation of human capacities, computer programmers are creating systems that are intelligent in different ways, and educators are freshly acknowledging that their students have distinctive strengths and weaknesses.
author: Howard Gardner, Intelligence Reframed: Multiple Intelligences for the 21st Century

quote: We were fair game but we have kept out of the cesspool. We are strong. We are the good ones. Do not discover us for we lie together all in green like pond weeds. Hold me, my young dear, hold me.
author: Anne Sexton
tags: anne-sexton, fairytale, hold-me, poetry, rapunzel, strength, strong

quote: Life in general was cruel and offered only different types of voids and chaos. The only way to tolerate it, to have any hope of escaping it, I reasoned, was to know my own strength, to defy life by surviving it.
author: Lucy Grealy, Autobiography of a Face

quote: Integrity is never a given. It is a quality that can only be proven over time.
author: Gary   Hopkins
tags: decency, ethics, honesty, honor, integrity, morality, righteousness, strength, virtue

quote: The American flag doesn't give her glory on a peaceful, calm day. It's when the winds pick up and become boisterous, do we see her strength. When she unfolds her hand, and shows her frayed fingers, where we see the stretch of red-blood lines of man that fought for this land. The purity of white stripes that strips our sins, and the stars of Abraham's covenant, broad in a midnight blue sky. The rights our forefathers established. As it waves high in the currents of freedom, where the Torch of Liberty shines over the sea, does she give meaning to unity. When we strive as one nation, or when it drops half-mast, to a fallen soldier.
author: Anthony Liccione
tags: america, blow, bravery, character, citizenship, civil-rights, covenant-of-abraham, equality, fight, flag, forefathers, freedom, glory, god, government, gust-of-wind, half-mast, history, independence, mourning, oneness, opportunity, peaceful, power, privilege, sea, soldier, statue-of-liberty, strength, torch, united-states, unity, war, winds

quote: Father, be near as we are surrounded by this cloud of deep suffering. Open our eyes to see that you are all things, the light and the darkness, not only those things that seem good in our eyes, but the horrifying unexplainable. Wrap us up inside of the cloud and reveal the mysteries that can only be learned in places of sorrow, that when we walk out we will be as Moses, transformed by the shadow and beaming with the radiant light of your glory. Give us the strength to love on, though our hearts are broken.
author: Anna White, Mended: Thoughts on Life, Love, and Leaps of Faith
tags: bereavement, broken-heart, christianity, darkness, faith, god, grief, loss, love, memoir, prayer, religion, shadow, strength, suffering

quote: When others cannot find something to hold onto … we can reach out and be their anchor in that moment.
author: Aaron Woodall
tags: depression, help, hope, inspirational, listening, strength, suicide

quote: Live vertically, not horizontally.
author: Shannon L. Alder
tags: action, bravery, choices, fearless, happiness, horizontal, joyful, live-with-purpose, move-forward, positiveness, service, strength, vertical

quote: I was supposed to be powerless, and as a result they failed to see that I possessed claws.
author: Nenia Campbell, Bleeds My Desire

author: Sara Sheridan

quote: Will my future faith be dominated by past demons? Will my unlimited possibilities give way to my limited territory?"Read more in A Daughter's Worth Novel
author: Michelle Carithers

quote: Family’s the luck of the draw, Lena. What you make of yourself, because of or despite it, that’s where the spine and heart come in.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: Bad habits are like comfort zones; easier to get into, but harder to get out of.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: How can the face that welcomed me into the world be the face I'll soon forget? How can the body I came through be the body I don't really know?
author: Michelle Carithers

quote: Integrity is never given. It is a quality that can only be proven over time.
author: Gary   Hopkins

author: Brandi L. Bates, Remains To Be Seen

quote: Courage is meant to be strong, while fear is meant to be broken
author: Zoe Rosenberg

quote: Grace does not contest the powers-that-be through an effective show of verifiable strength but through a persistent and subversive recoding of how one defines what strength and weakness are.
author: Adam Miller, Badiou, Marion and St Paul: Immanent Grace

quote: Will my future faith be dominated by past demons? Will my unlimited possibilities give way to my limited territory?
author: Michelle Carithers

quote: But Jocelyn Morgenstern was not the kind of woman who wept, not the kind of woman who broke, or Valentine would have broken her long since.
author: Cassandra Clare, The Last Stand of the New York Institute

quote: Let Ian laugh. Let him believe pain will ruin me. I know better. I've already been ruined once, and I know how to rise from the ashes. I know how to find my broken pieces.
author: C.J. Redwine, Deception
tags: ashes, bravery, courage, deception, inspirational, rachel, rise, strength

quote: It is ironic that constructive thinkers are often misunderstood as negative, as they differ from those longing for positivity: constructive thinkers have been conditioned to find positive in negative rather than suffering from the negative in negative. Or as Paul the Apostle wrote, 'I have learned the secret to contentment in any and every circumstance.' He was right. Indeed the Lord is our strength, especially under the commandment to love one another. Otherwise we are nothing and easily thrown about by both our own and other people's mind control in a painful, mental, physical desperation to run from every thought, every thing, and every one not seeming so positive or immediately beneficial to us.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
tags: apostle-paul, constructive-thought, god, love, negativity, positivity, strength, suffering, thinking

quote: Summer is the time for squabbles. In winter, we must protect one another, keep each other warm, share our strengths.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Game of Thrones

quote: When everything has gone down, God wants youto look up
author: Richmond Akhigbe
tags: acknowledgement, anointing, authority, believe, christ, church, confidence, conquer, courage, decision, deliverance, divine, down, faith, fate, glory, god, going, grace, healer, holy-spirit, hope, house-of-god, jesus, keeping-on, laden, liberty, look, lord, love, man, mercy, messiah, might, mighty, power, predicament, problems, proof, protector, reason, rest, revelation, salvation, strength, tribulations, trust, up, victory, will, word

quote: Everyone needs to prove they're strong. The truly strong only have to do it once.
author: Kit Rocha, Beyond Control

quote: It's impossible, that's for sure. So let's start working.
author: Philippe Petit, Man on Wire
tags: aplomb, confidence, inspirational, motivational, spirit, strength

quote: The height of your achievements is determined by the depth of your self-belief, the strength of your resolve and the intensity of your efforts.
author: Roopleen
tags: achievements, efforts, height, inspiration, intensity, motivation, resolve, self-belief, strength, success, wisdom

quote: Deep the waves may be and cold, But Jehovah is our refuge, And His promise is our hold; For the Lord Himself hath said it, He, the faithful God and true: "When thou comest to the waters Thou shalt not go down, BUT THROUGH." Seas of sorrow, seas of trial, Bitterest anguish, fiercest pain, Rolling surges of temptation Sweeping over heart and brain They shall never overflow us For we know His word is true; All His waves and all His billows He will lead us safely through. Threatening breakers of destruction, Doubt's insidious undertow, Shall not sink us, shall not drag us Out to ocean depths of woe; For His promise shall sustain us, Praise the Lord, whose Word is true! We shall not go down, or under, For He saith, "Thou passest THROUGH
author: Annie Johnson Flint

quote: There is this fine line between presenting to You all of my weakness and thinking that it can't be done. In Your strength, I find my own.
author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quote: Life is like a game if you fail try again until you master and accomplish, but remember if you accomplish it glorify God who created you and gives you strength.
author: Daniel Habil
tags: accomplish, encouragement, fail, failure, game, glorify, god, hope, inspirational, religion, strength, try-again, uplifting

quote: But you need to make sure that the last thing you remember about today isn't that you fell down, it's that you got back up again. That's what we do when bad things happen to us.
author: Michael Rowe, Wild Fell

quote: Worry is a down payment on a problem you may never have. It doesn't empty tomorrow of its sorrow, just empties today of its strength.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: William is the most skilled protector that I have ever seen. He is the best." Determination began to swell inside of me. "Then I will have to be better." Margo Westly
author: Meredith T. Taylor, Churning Waters (The Churning Waters Saga)
tags: love-hurts, lovers-sadness, strength, strength-and-courage, strength-of-character, strength-of-spirit

quote: Strength doesn't necessarily come from resisting fear, weakness, or any other feeling and overcoming it. Strength comes from looking at those things straight on--and accepting them as they really are.
author: Kat Von D., Go Big or Go Home: Taking Risks in Life, Love, and Tattooing

quote: My vigour, vitality, and cheek repel me. I am the kind of woman I would run from.
author: Nancy Astor the Viscountess Astor

quote: To me, the haircut represented beauty and strength, that I was a woman who would live her life without the boundaries imposed upon her by other people.
author: Kat Von D., Go Big or Go Home: Taking Risks in Life, Love, and Tattooing
tags: beauty, boundaries, individuality, life-lessons, strength, woman

quote: Being a part of the world in a healthy, mindful, present sense means learning to have complete faith that things will work out. Living in this world means that instead of cowering away, or giving up when the going gets a bit tough, get up and keep going. You’re not here merely to survive or fight your way through the world.
author: Leigh Hershkovich
tags: fighting, give-up, life, living, strength, survive

quote: Almighty Freedom! give my venturous songThe force, the charm that to thy voice belong;Tis thine to shape my course, to light my way,To nerve my country with the patriot lay,To teach all men where all their interest lies,How rulers may be just and nations wise:Strong in thy strength I bend no suppliant knee,Invoke no miracle, no Muse but thee.
author: Joel Barlow, The Columbiad

quote: The power of the Will in a man, is favoured by the Heavens. The man who sets his Heart and Word onto something, and says "I will" no matter what obstacle is placed in his way— joins the ranks of the demi-gods. All else remain in mortality and are soon forgotten.
author: C. JoyBell C.
tags: demi-gods, inspirational-quotes, man-s-will, perseverance, power-of-the-will, strength, strength-of-will, the-law-of-the-gods, wisdom-quotes

quote: That I’ve horrified many flight attendants across the globe with my oft-thought morbid ritual of listening to Tuesday’s Gone as we fly through the sky is not my concern. My declaration evident, my truth now burns: there is no preordained destiny to battle, I thumb my nose at fate. I am a warrior. The rules don’t apply.
author: Ava Ayers, Pretty Hate
tags: adversity, ava-ayers, heartbreak, pretty-hate, relationships, strength, warrior

quote: Your emotions will wander like a vagabond when you're indebted. Those happy moments with friends will soon be interrupted with a frowning creditor in your sub-conscious, and all your frenzy will be taken aback.

tags: agony, bills, debt, emotion, emotions, feelings, happiness, indebted, labour, low-spirits, michael-bassey-johnson, pains, pay-your-bills, peace, peace-of-mind, settlement, strength, unhappy, weaken, work

quote: And even when success comes, as I am sure it will, bear in mind that there are more quiet and enviable joys than to be among the most sought after women at a ball...
author: Blanche Wiesen Cook, Eleanor Roosevelt, Vol 1, 1884-1933
tags: adversity, independence, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, strength, strength-of-character, success, women, women-s-inspirational, women-s-strength

quote: If one lied, or put you down, don't mourn don't grieve, for why do you care, you don't want to be friends with the mean.
author: Zoe Rosenberg

quote: Trolls must continually feed their bottomless need, so be strong and patiently wait out their fires of hatred for eventually they eat their own.
author: L.M. Fields

quote: Determination in spite of the challenge makes us stronger.
author: Ellen J. Barrier
tags: challenges, despite, determination, determine, perseverance, persevere, strength, strong

quote: Quite often you look for answers and strength in friends (supposed 2b) around you, without realizing All the true strength and honest answers come from within!!!
author: v filipa ketteridge

quote: Don’t give up on yourself. It’s incredibly cliche, but it’s true. The worst is yet to come if you give up on yourself. Hold yourself in high regard, and know that, though the ride may be bumpy and uncomfortable, there is a silver lining. You have to be able to see the good things in all that happens to you.
author: Leigh Hershkovich
tags: happiness, love, silver-living, strength, success, truth

quote: The Storms of This LifeWatching the distant clouds building and growing forevermoreThe harsh wind begins rushing thru the leaves with the branches bending to and froIn the attempts to not give in again I'm standing firm on all that I knowAnd extending out my hand reaching beyond the heavens aboveGrasping for His strength to hold on, along with the endurance to make it thruPraying that the ground beneath me will not erode nor engulf all that I love
author: Christine Upton
tags: endurance-and-attitude, faith, fear, god, inspirational, life, love, pain, strength

quote: So, when I thought June might take you away, I didn’t know what to do. I felt like she was taking everything that mattered to me. I felt like she was taking away from you all the things that I didn’t have. That’s why I’m sorry. I’m sorry because you shouldn’t have to be everything to me. I had you, but I’d forgotten that I had myself too.
author: Marie Lu, Champion
tags: champion, inspirational, legend, legend-trilogy, marie-lu, self-belief, strength, tess

quote: And this is what being an artist means, being a poet? To sacrifice yourself for your art, sacrifice your heart for your art, because it’s only through something broken that something beautiful can grow.
author: Charlotte Eriksson, Empty Roads & Broken Bottles; in search for The Great Perhaps

author: M. Scott Peck, The Road Less Traveled: A New Psychology of Love, Traditional Values, and Spiritual Growth

quote: Every time I watch a person awaken to their inner strength, I see what we’re made of, and we’re magnificent. We’re brilliant. We really are. We crave magic because we are magic. We crave power because we are pure power.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness
tags: hope, inner-strength, inspirational, life, magic, spirituality, strength

quote: It was not my strength that wanted nursing, it was my imagination that wanted soothing.
author: Joseph Conrad, Heart of Darkness

quote: In the end, He's the only reason that I made it. Sometimes that's the only thing we have. Whether you call it God, or hope, or faith -whatever word you use- the fact is, I couldn't have survived if I hadn't believed in something. It was the one part of me that neither Warren nor Allen could touch, and no matter what happens, as long as I have that, I've won.

tags: elissa-wall, faith, flds, god, hope, stolen-innocence, strength, survival

quote: Struggle is the meaning of life
author: defeat or victory is in the hands of God. But struggle itself is man’s duty and should be his joy.
tags: Sir Sultan Muhammad Shah Aga Khan III

quote: Lord, whatsoever this day may bring, Thy name be praised. Be gracious unto me and help me. Grant me strength to bear whatsoever Thou dost send, And let not fear overrule me. I trust Thy grace, and commit my life wholly into Thy Hands. Whether I live or whether I die, I am with Thee and Thou are with me … Lord, I wait for Thy salvation, and for the coming of Thy Kingdom. Amen.

quote: I feel I've lost every part of me...there's nothing left but the parts I've given to you. I need you to hold those pieces together. Please don't forget who I was...then...then there really will be nothing left.
author: Cassandra Giovanni, Faded Perfection

author: Osamu Dazai, The Setting Sun

quote: I was surprise to see the world didn't stop just cause my boy did.
author: Kathryn Stockett, The Help

quote: The alleged power to charm down insanity, or ferocity in beasts, is a power behind the eye.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, The Conduct of Life: A Philosophical Reading

quote: No matter how old you are or how long--or short!--you've been married, the day you accelerate your growth in the Lord is the day your marriage is positively impacted, improved, and strengthened!
author: Jim George, A Husband After God's Own Heart

author: Elizabeth George, A Mom After God's Own Heart Devotional
tags: bible, christian, faith, god, heart, home, love, mom, quite-time, spirit, strength, time, women, word

author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Dream large and make yaour dreams defy the laws of gravity. Soar high and show your inner strength
author: Lee Pryke

quote: How do evil people find the strength to do good?
author: Keith Hollihan, The Four Stages of Cruelty: A Novel

quote: My limits know me well enough to stay out of my way.
author: Ben Mitchell

quote: Simply blessed.
author: LaNina King
tags: blessed, god, king, lanina, strength, thankful

quote: While one can love an irresponsible friend or a person with character flaws, alliances are built on respect, the responsibilities which arise out of that and knowing that together we can be stronger.
author: Gisela Hausmann "Naked Determination 41 Stories About Overcoming Fear"

quote: The Days tried to put inside me " weakness ..." .. But my soul will always beat " strength".
author: Jad Alhadad

quote: Since God is with you and you are with God, you have nothing to fear!
author: Jim George, A Leader After God's Own Heart: 15 Ways to Lead with Strength

quote: I just hope I'm around long enough to see it through.” Sara said, looking uncertain.“All of us wonder that, at some point or another,” Arch replied cryptically. “It's your destiny, and all of fate is aligning to see it come to pass. This next thirty days won't be easy. Hell is sending out its best fighters, and I'm sending out one of mine. I have faith that he will see you through.
author: Rose Wynters, Voluptuous Vindication

quote: Today is a great day of inspiration and gaining strength to move forward with determination and purpose.
author: Lee Pryke

quote: God desires that we develop spiritual muscle so we are strong enough to be His kind of wife.
author: Elizabeth George, A Wife After God's Own Heart
tags: christian, faith, god, husband, muscle, religion, spiritual, strength, wife

quote: This virtuous and very industrious woman needs physical strength and ability to do the work of her life, the work of love.
author: Elizabeth George, Beautiful in God's Eyes: The Treasures of the Proverbs 31 Woman
tags: christian, faith, god, industrious, lady, life, love, strength, virtuous, woman, women, work

quote: If you want your prayers answered, you get off your knees and do the one thing you’re praying someone else will do for you.
author: Shannon L. Alder
tags: accountable, bravery, choices, courage, determination, fearless, love, ownership, pray, prayer, responsibility, stewardship, strength

quote: She was a woman of combined beauty and quiet strength. No wonder he had fallen in love with her so many years ago. No wonder he was in love with her now. And she would never know it.
author: Christy English, Love on a Midsummer Night
tags: beauty, falling-in-love, love, passion, romance, starcrossed, strength

quote: In vain do we seek tranquility in the desert; temptations are always with us; our passions, represented by the demons, never let us alone: those monsters created by the heart, those illusions produced by the mind, those vain specters that are our errors and our lies always appear before us to seduce us; they attack us even in our fasting or our mortifications, in other words, in our very strength.
author: Montesquieu, Persian Letters
tags: deamons, lies, life, monsters, passion, seduction, strength

quote: A sacrifice is not about expecting God to break the bond you have with another person. You make the sacrifice on your own because God is more important than the bond.
author: Shannon L. Alder
tags: devotion, inspiration, letting-go, love, moving-on, muse, priorities, right-choices, sacrafices, sacrifices, strength, whats-important

quote: Finally I was able to see that if I had a contribution I wanted to make, I must do it, despite what others said. That I was OK the way I was. That it was all right to be strong.
author: Wangari Maathai

quote: I learned that I was never alone, that there was Someone always very close by and, indeed, within me, giving me strength in times of weakness and desolation, light in times of darkness, joy in times of great sorrow and pain, and the will to struggle on when continuing seemed futile.
author: Joseph F. Girzone, My Struggle with Faith
tags: faith, jesus, jesus-christ, never-alone, peace-of-jesus, strength, strength-through-adversity, struggle

quote: And what some people don't understand was that bleeding wasn't a sign of weakness; it was a sign of strength. It demonstrated to the world that you were vulnerable and ordinary, but when you wanted something enough, and fought hard for it, you were capable of doing extraordinary things.
author: Natasha Ngan, The Elites

quote: The world is a cruel place, Petrosinella, and it wounds the weak.
author: Kate Forsyth, Bitter Greens

quote: The humanitarian philosophies that have been developed (sometimes under some religious banner and invariably in the face of religious opposition) are human inventions, as the name implies - and our species deserves the credit. I am a devout atheist - nothing else makes any sense to me and I must admit to being bewildered by those, who in the face of what appears so obvious, still believe in a mystical creator. However I can see that the promise of infinite immortality is a more palatable proposition than the absolute certainty of finite mortality which those of us who are subject to free thought (as opposed to free will) have to look forward to and many may not have the strength of character to accept it.Thus I am a supporter of Amnesty International, a humanist and an atheist. I believe in a secular, democratic society in which women and men have total equality, and individuals can pursue their lives as they wish, free of constraints - religious or otherwise. I feel that the difficult ethical and social problems which invariably arise must be solved, as best they can, by discussion and am opposed to the crude simplistic application of dogmatic rules invented in past millennia and ascribed to a plethora of mystical creators - or the latest invention; a single creator masquerading under a plethora of pseudonyms. Organisations which seek political influence by co-ordinated effort disturb me and thus I believe religious and related pressure groups which operate in this way are acting antidemocratically and should play no part in politics. I also have problems with those who preach racist and related ideologies which seem almost indistinguishable from nationalism, patriotism and religious conviction.
author: Harry W. Kroto
tags: acceptance, amnesty-international, ancient-dogma, atheism, atheist, autobiography, beliefs, biography, creator, democracy, dogma, equality, ethics, existence, freedom, freethought, humanism, humanist, humanitarian, ideology, immortality, individual-rights, morality, mortality, mystical, mysticism, nationalism, nobel-laureate, obvious, patriotism, philosophy, politics, racism, religious-conviction, religious-opposition, science, scientist, secular-humanism, secular-humanist, sense, separation-of-church-and-state, simplistic, strength, superstition, views

quote: Friendship love. This is a very special thing. It’s the sort of love where you know another being’s strengths and weaknesses, perfections and imperfections, and you love the whole package.
author: Angelo Dirks, Seven Dogs in Heaven

quote: If Strength comes through Suffering, why then I should be the strongest of all women, yet I am the weakest. God help me. Help me.
author: Lee Smith, On Agate Hill
tags: calling-on-god, mariah-rutherford-snow, on-ag, strength, struggles, women-s-strength

quote: Tranquility is not weakness
author: from tranquility emerges power and strength.

quote: Stupidity isn't the only thing humans carry inside of them. I'll show you that we also have the power to purify.
author: Yellow Tanabe
tags: humans, impact, man, power, qualities, strength

quote: Break a bone..and as the broken part heals it becomes the strongest part in it....get hit by a virus, survive that and "supposedly" it can never get u again... observe how ur skin that gets rubbed on a surface often becomes thicker and more rough with time ....remember how naive you were before and with each incident and accident with people that you've had ..it brought you to the "knowing better" person you are now............you cant be stronger..if life doesn't try you every now and then ....and after each trial..it promises a stronger more immune version of you
author: Eman Farouk

quote: She needs you for more than just protection. It's how it works. You want the strong girl, you understand that she's with you because she wants to be. Not because she has to be. You know that, right?
author: Rachel Caine, Fall of Night

quote: Some say God is living there [in space]. I was looking around very attentively, but I did not see anyone there. I did not detect either angels or gods....I don't believe in God. I believe in man - his strength, his possibilities, his reason.
author: Gherman Titov
tags: astronaut, atheism, atheist, cosmonaut, mankind, reason, russian, space, strength

quote: I did not need him to survive. He inspired me to find that strength in myself.
author: Chrissy Moon, Surreal Ecstasy

quote: So many years of being lonely and discounted, no one ever truly seeing me, the person that I really am. The Gabriella I so desperately wanted to be. Yet somehow he broke through the walls and barriers and penetrated my frail, dejected heart. He loves me for all that I am and what I will become, even though it scares us both to death. He accepts the darkest parts of me and doesn't try to change me, in all my shattered complexity. Meeting him has given this facade of my life new meaning. He's given me purpose, strength. He's given me love. Dorian has given me everything and, in turn, is everything to me. Designed by the Divine Power especially for me.
author: S.L. Jennings, Dark Light
tags: acceptance, change, complex, discounted, heart, life, lonely, love, meaning, purpose, strength

quote: I was once told that sometimes out of limitation comes our greatest strength.
author: Carol McKay, Second chances: true stories of living with Addison's disease

quote: I am doing what is right and from my heart against all odds.
author: Karen Todd Scarpulla, Walking Toward the Light: A Journey in Forgiveness and Death

quote: If fear is cultivated it will become stronger, if faith is cultivated it will achieve mastery.
author: John Paul Jones

quote: I am a strong individual that may seem weak; but, my strength is in my ability to stay in the fight and sure my enemies that I can take the punches; and, still stay strong in my weakness. Because within time God will turn my weak persona to my strength. I will be able to show myself and others that being strong in a weak persona is a sign of humility.
author: Temitope Owosela

quote: Success can be defined as how hard you continue to fight when they tell you that the battle is over.
author: Mark W. Boyer

quote: If you can get life outta love, you should die trying to get love outta life.
author: Shane Rainey
tags: charity, courage, faith, good-things, happiness, hope, life, love, strength

quote: I am not powerless.
author: Ky Grabowski, 2013: A Stellar Collection

quote: True strength comes from the mind and spirit.
author: Drew Karpyshyn, Children of Fire

quote: I always am in a role, lovely – for you, for them – even for myself. Yeah... Even when I’m alone, I am still in a role – and I myself am the most exacting audience I have ever had.
author: Simona Panova, Nightmarish Sacrifice
tags: acting, actor, actress, alone, always, audience, control, demand, demanding, drama, dramatic, emotion, emotional, emotionless, exact, exacting, fake, feel, feelings, feelless, forbid, forbidden, goth, gothic, gothic-romance, hide, hiding, lonely, mask, masks, play, postmodern, postmodernism, pretend, pretending, romance, romantic, self-image, stern, strength, strong, suspense, theater, theatre, weak, weakness, young-adult, young-adult-gothic-romance

quote: The wreckage of stars - I built a world from this wreckage.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Dithyrambs of Dionysus
tags: astronomy, creation, existentialism, inspiration, inspirational, life-affirmation, life-affirming, motivation, motivational, overman, power, rebirth, stars, strength, universe, will-to-power, world, wreckage

quote: Always remember, wherever you are, whether near or far, you had a mother who really, really loved you. The original mother. Once you've found your true inner guru you can never again be divided. Perfect union with the divine, through the grace of your real teacher, transcends time, space, death and all worldly limitations. Your real teacher is the original mother - regardless in which manifest or non-manifest form, or gender, she appears. The one who nurtures you and the one who also, out of wisdom and compassion, corrects you if you are misguided.
author: Zeena Schreck
tags: bhairavi, bhakti, death, empowerment, freedom, goddess, guru, guru-puja, healing, healing-rituals, jivanmukti, left-hand-path, love, magick-and-faith, men, mother, mothers-love, parenting, self-esteem, spiritual-journey, spiritual-mother-love, spiritual-teachers, spiritual-transformation, spiritual-wisdom, spirituality, strength, tantric-buddhism, truth, vamamarga, visions, women, women-warriors, zeena-schreck

quote: The true purpose of the strong is to promote greater strength in the weak, and not to keep the weak in that state where they are at the mercy of the strong.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: The man who never weakens when things are against him will grow stronger and stronger until all things will delight to be for him. He will finally have all the strength he may desire or need. Be always strong and you will always be stronger.Picture in your mind your own best idea of what a strong, well-developed individuality would necessarily be, and then think of yourself as becoming more and more like that picture. In this connection it is well to remember that we gradually grow into the likeness of that which we think of the most. Therefore, if you have a very clear idea of a highly developed individuality, and think a great deal of that individuality with a strong, positive desire to develop such an individuality, you will gradually and surely move towards that lofty ideal.
author: Christian D. Larson
tags: desire, goals, growth, ideal, positive, strength, think, thought, visualization

quote: Nicci looked up at Kahlan. “Knives are not my talent.” “It’s not hard,” Kahlan said as she pressed the handle into Nicci’s hand. “When the time is right, just stick the pointed end somewhere important in someone you really don’t like.
author: Terry Goodkind, Confessor

quote: I’ve never met a woman who is not strong, but sometimes they don’t let it out. Then there’s a tragedy, and then all of a sudden that strength comes. My message is let the strength come out before the tragedy.
author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quote: I'm not surprised he wants to challenge me here, where no one can protect me. He thinks I'm a weak woman. He thinks wrong.
author: Heather Day Gilbert, God's Daughter

quote: I intend to bring you strength, joy, courage, perspicacity, defiance.
author: André Gide

quote: One of the greatest lies ever told is that there’s no power in vulnerability.
author: Dianna Hardy, The Last Dragon
tags: humanity, humanity-and-society, lies, power, strength, vulnerability, weakness

quote: It’s called an inner voice for a reason. It’s the gnawing feeling inside your stomach telling you yes or no. It’s the one voice in your life that isn’t tampered by other’s biased opinions, scars, feelings or thoughts. Go with it, you know yourself better than anyone ever does.
author: Hope Alcocer
tags: empowerment, inspirational, intuition, right-or-wrong, soul, strength, voice, women

quote: When I met you — somehow you healed me. From the inside out, the outside in. We conquered fears together, we learned, we laughed, and we loved. I swear, you caused my heart to soar more in the past few months than it has in my entire existence. My heart is whole because you chose to share yours with me, and it’s for that reason that I get down on not one, but both knees…” I knelt in front of her and gripped her hand. “And say thank you. Thank you for saving my life, thank you for loving me enough to treasure your own, and thank you for being my strength when I had none. I’d like to think our hearts are joined — forever entwined — but considering that’s not technically a legal joining, I have a question for youMarry me? Make me the happiest man alive.” I opened the box revealing my mom’s ring.
author: Rachel Van Dyken

quote: For years, i lived my life, waiting for the other shoe to drop... i thought control was something i could have over my life. My goal was to live life, in such a way, that i would never again have to suffer any form of trauma or abuse that would remind me of my painful past. I was living life on a tightrope of tension. I was only happy when things went smoothly and came apart at the seams when i was thrown a curveball.NOW, i realize, that the key to happiness is surrendering to the illusion of control. And to trust that, no matter what happens to me, i have the infinite inner-wisdom and strength to find my way through.
author: Jaeda DeWalt
tags: happiness-life, inner-wisdom, inspirational, learning-to-cope, strength, surrendering-control, wisdom, wise-words

quote: The strength was always in you. All you had to do was find it.
author: Katherine Givens, In Her Dreams
tags: family, historical-romance, in-her-dreams, inspiration, katherine-givens, love, romance, sisters, strength

quote: His lips brush my ear as his voice causes my body to come to attention. “If the night never ends, then there’s never a new day … and with a new day comes renewed hope, light.
author: J.B. McGee, Skipping Stones
tags: hope, inspirational-love-story, light, new-day, new-hope, renewed-spirit, strength

quote: One thing I’ve learnt about humans: you can’t judge their strength by the size of their actions, but by the devotion of an act, no matter how small.
author: Dianna Hardy, The Last Dragon
tags: devotion, human-nature, humanity, humans, strength, strength-of-character, strength-of-spirit

quote: Sometimes you don’t realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
author: Susan Gale

quote: She had taken many more punches to both body and soul than anyone should ever have to endure. But she had been able to rebel every time.
author: Stieg Larsson

quote: Fate lies in our hands, its just that we need to be brave enough to read it & desire enough to change it
author: Anamika Mishra
tags: brave, fate, life, luck, strength, write

quote: It is just the old way--that of obedience. If you have ever seen the Lord, if only from afar--if you have any vaguest suspicion that the Jew Jesus, who professed to have come from God, was a better man, a different man--one of your first duties must be to open your ears to His words and see whether they seem to you to be true. Then, if they do, to obey them with your whole strength and might. This is the way of life, which will lead a man out of its miseries into life indeed.
author: George MacDonald, The Marquis' Secret

quote: I can do ALL THINGS through Christ who empowers, enriches, equips, enlightens, energizes, recreates, revives, promotes, strengthens, purifies, sponsors, and prepares me! Yes, I can... ALL THINGS, I can!
author: Israelmore Ayivor
tags: all-things, all-things-are-possible, apostle-paul, can, christ, christians, create, dunamis, dunamis-power, elightens, empower, empowers, energizes, enrich, equip, equips, food-for-thought, god, i, i-can, i-can-do-it, israelmore-ayivor, jehovah, jesus, jesus-christ, me, paul, possible, power, prepares, promote, promotes, promotion, protects, purifies, purify, recreate, recreates, restoration, revival, revive, salvation, she, sponsor, sponsors, strength, strengthens, strenthen, they, we-he, with-god, you, you-can, you-can-do-it

quote: The greatest battle you must undertake, the foremost battle you must wage, the most important battle that there is, is the battle of courage versus fear – and there can be only one victor – that victor must be you and courage, or it shall be the dark side and death.
author: Kevin Michel, Moving Through Parallel Worlds To Achieve Your Dreams

quote: All he'd learned was that love was a jewel with too many facets to count. Strength and weakness running side by side through it. And that no one could give or take it with any less than an open hand.
author: Nora Roberts, Heart of the Sea

quote: Those who are not free to live as they choose are second class citizens. The weak will lose everything to the strong, even their lives.
author: Naoyuki Ochiai, Syndrome 1866 Vol. 4
tags: courage, freedom, life, strength, strength-through-adversity, weak, weakness

quote: Then Anu and Bel called by name me, Hammurabi, the exalted prince, who feared God, to bring about the rule of righteousness in the land, to destroy the wicked and the evil-doers; so that the strong should not harm the weak.
author: Code of Hammurabi 1772 B.C.

quote: My strength was returning as we went on. It occurred to me then that it was in times of struggle that I found the best parts of myself-courage, loyalty, an unexpected peace- and I always discovered what I needed to break through and go on.
author: Patrick Carman, Stargazer
tags: courage, go-on, land-of-elyon, loyalty, peace, strength

quote: Too much work will create too much motivation for the strong, and a big collapse for the weak! Strength gets great strength from the challenges!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: I'd think, maybe he truly is something extraordinary. He's what he is, that's it. Maybe that makes him strong enough, being what he is.
author: Ken Kesey, One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

quote: Many great people over the centuries have depended on their faith- it is a sign of great strength to need Jesus in your life.
author: Bear Grylls, To My Sons: Lessons for the Wild Adventure Called Life

quote: I vowed that I would never tell anyone of my shame. They say that when you kept a secret, it eats you up inside, but I felt it was better that way. I wanted to appear strong in front of my children and my family. I didn't want anybody to know. And I would maintain my persona as Jenni, the Rivera Rebel who had never lost a fight. But deep down inside I knew I had lost a piece of myself that I would never recover. My soul had been shattered, but to the outside world I did just as I had been taught since I was a little girl; I kept my head up and continued forward. It is, after all, the Rivera way.
author: Jenni Rivera, Unbreakable: My Story, My Way

quote: The human body is robust. It can gather strength when it's in mortal danger.
author: Toni Morrison, Song of Solomon

quote: That’s exactly what I’ll do, I thought to myself. After dinner, I’m going to ask BigBrother to teach me how to read this map. With Aunt Baba still in Tianjin, there’sobviously nobody looking out for me. I’ll just have to find my own way.
author: Adeline Yen Mah, Chinese Cinderella: The True Story of an Unwanted Daughter

quote: Success comes with failure which leads to doubts but with determination we can still achieve.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett
tags: 2013, achieve, barack-obama, carrer-choices, college, determination, goals, inspirational, joel-osteen, john-blake, jonathan-anthony-burkett, life, love, school, strength, success, twitter-quotes, work

quote: The strength of your obstacle determines the weight of your potentials. The greater your potentials, the heavier your dunamis power must be.
author: Israelmore Ayivor
tags: action, barriers, don-t-be-afraid, don-t-give-up, don-t-quit, dunamis, dunamis-power, enemies, enemy, extra, extra-miles, food-for-thought, great-work, greater, heavier, heavy, israelmore-ayivor, labour, never-give-up, obstacle, obstacles, potent, potentials, power, strength, strong, stronger, weight, work, you-can, you-can-do-it

quote: A nation is not defined by its borders or the boundaries of its land mass Rather, a nation is defined by adverse people who have been unified by a cause and a value system and who are committed to a vision for the type of society they wish to live in and give to the future generations to come.
author: Fela Durotoye
tags: future, inspirational, leadership, nation, nation-building, national-identity, nigeria, strength

quote: A man's strength was supposed to be against the outside world: to fight it back from himself and those he took under his protection: his wife, his children, and for a man strong enough, more people still, people like his employees. To turn it inward, against the very people you had been given that strength to protect, because you couldn't deal with the outward fight, was the ultimate weakness.
author: Laura Florand, The Chocolate Touch

quote: Do not lower the standard or cater to the worldly laxness of the average Christian by making the way in easy. Make sure that everyone who joins fully understands his duties and obligations and is willing, in Christ's strength, to undertake them.
author: Isabella MacDonald Alden, Chrissy's Endeavor

quote: We all have vices, visible and invisible. Some we deliberately keep secret. Others we don’t even realize or we refuse to admit we have…Vices can be lots of fun, or they can turn your life into a living hell. Accept them for what they are, just another aspect of the mind’s creation, and you can enjoy them—if you choose—without being broken by them.- Zeena Schreck for VICE Magazine
author: Zeena Schreck
tags: empowerment, freedom-of-choice, freedom-of-thought, independence, morality, self-determination, sins, spiritual-transformation, strength, vice-magazine, vices, virtues-and-vices, zeena-schreck

quote: ... scar tissue was the strongest tissue in the human body.
author: Madeleine L'Engle, Certain Women

quote: In order to move forward, you will have to stumble along the way, but every falter in your stride just makes your next step even stronger.
author: Lindsay Chamberlin

quote: That's why I hate the concept of falling in love. It makes you weak. It takes away your strength. Your power. Your rational sense. EVERYTHING.
author: baka_usagi, Forbidden Apple

quote: ...whatever happens I'll not be afraid again; for, when you've once pushed through the place of torment to the peace beyond, you know that you can do it again. You know there's a strength somewhere that you can call upon. You've confidence.
author: Elizabeth Goudge, The Castle on the Hill

quote: Realize your strengths, accept your weaknesses, but never become someone you don't recognize.
author: Lindsay Chamberlin

quote: You know how the Eclipse of the sun shows it? Christ's strength eclipses your powerlessness in God's likeness, and there is total darkness on your weakness.
author: Israelmore Ayivor
tags: calvary, christ, cross-of-calvary, dark, darkness, eclipse, eclipse-of-the-moon, eclipse-of-the-sun, god, god-s-love, golgatha, jesus-christ, likeness, moon, power, powerful, powerless, redeemer, redemption, sacrifice, salvation, strength, strong, sun, weak, weakness

quote: Strength, strength is what I need; nothing can be done without strength; and strength must be gained by strength.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Crime and Punishment

quote: When we help others to perform at the highest level of their potential, we receive something of value; our character is strengthened.
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: The tough challenges we encounters, makes us stronger, and wiser. With each victory we gain something of value; our character is strengthened.
author: Ellen J. Barrier
